§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! обладает полом, права которого культурно и религиозно защищены.\n
Особые гендерные §Yзаконы§! и §Yигровые правила§! НЕ активны\n
Можно вызывать своих врагов на дуэль.
Можно назначать своих сестёр и дочерей щитоносицами.
Командуя войсками, вы переживаете новые события на поле боя.
As you are a member of a §YWarrior Lodge§!, you can go on a rampage through your [From.GetCapitalHolding].
Позволяет, кликнув §Gправой кнопкой мыши§! на своём портрете, получить черту §Yберсерк§!.
Командуя войсками и успешно захватывая поселения, вы имеете более высокий шанс на захват пленных и кражу артефактов.
Состоя в §Yвоинской ложе§!, вы можете пройти подготовку, чтобы получить новые способности на поле боя.
Позволяет, кликнув §Gправой кнопкой мыши§! на своём портрете, получить одну из черт характера, присущую полководцу.
Состоя в §Yвоинской ложе§!, вы можете призвать §Yполководца§! к своему двору.
В меню §YИнтриги§! вы можете призвать §Yполководца§! к своему двору.
Если гарнизон поселения не заполнен, вы можете сделать это моментально.
Позволяет, кликнув §Gправой кнопкой мыши§! по поселению, мгновенно заполнить его гарнизон.
Sacrifice to the gods, to gain a boon in upcoming battles.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! your character portrait, to perform a religious sacrifice in the hopes of a boon in upcoming battles.
Командуя войсками, вы больше не будете получать смертельных ранений на поле боя.

As long as you are at war and leading troops, you can activate a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu, which will continuously grant soldiers to your troops, appearing at your current location. Once peace is established, the regiments will take their leave.
Выберите один из трёх аспектов воинского искусства. Это позволит Вам получить одну из черт жизненного пути.
Позволяет, кликнув §Gправой кнопкой мыши§! на своём портрете, выбрать одну из трёх военных специализаций.

Отправив войско сюда, вы заблокируете его путь $DATE|Y$ (на $DAYS|Y$ дней)\nОтмена приказа будет невозможна\n
Когда армия прошла половину пути до следующего округа, её движение уже не может быть отменено. Это касается только движения между двумя округами, а не прочих приказов.

Правитель-[Root.GetReligionAdherent_M], который не был официально коронован уважаемым представителем духовенства, никогда не будет признан своими вассалами как законный.\nЧем дольше новый совершеннолетний [Root.GetRelAdj]ский монарх будет без короны, тем вероятнее его вассалы оспорят его право на трон.
Click to increase campaign funds by 10. SHIFT-click to increase by 100. CTRL-click to increase by enough to beat the best candidate, or by 100 if your candidate is the best candidate.
Click to decrease campaign funds by 10. SHIFT-click to decrease by 100. CTRL-click to remove the funds entirely.

Уменьшит вдвое стоимость вербовки. Не влияет на войска, набираемые за престиж.\n(§Y$GROWTH$%§! пополнение в месяц).
Вы будете платить полную стоимость за вербовку. Войска, набираемые за престиж, всегда пополняются с этой скоростью.\n(§Y$GROWTH$%§! пополнение в месяц)

Недавняя просьба о массовом обращении в другую веру

Принятие более цивилизованной религии поможет Вам укрепить государство и оставить позади пережитки прошлого.\nВы можете попросить, чтобы [Root.GetTitledFirstName] поддержал[Root.GetEndA] обращение Вашей страны в [Root.GetReligionFullName]. С помощью и поддержкой другой страны переход к новой вере пройдёт легче.\n[From.GetMassBaptismTribalAuthorityHint]

Select a ruler belonging to an organized religion, and petition him to sponsor the Mass Conversion of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. \nСчитается, что принятие более цивилизованной религии поможет Вам укрепить государство и оставить позади пережитки прошлого. In order to do so, you must have at least §Y500§! Prestige, you must have enacted the §YAbsolute Tribal Authority§! law in your realm, you must be at §YPeace§!, and your realm must not be under a §YRegency§!.
Убедитесь, что §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! НЕ спонсирует массов[Root.GetBaptismPostfixAndNameACC] какой-то страны
Убедитесь, что в последнее время НЕ просили о массовом обращении [From.GetBaptismTimer]
Убедитесь, что §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! в последнее время НЕ получал[Root.GetEndA] просьб о массов[Root.GetBaptismPostfixAndNamePREP] [Root.GetBaptismTimer]
Убедитесь, что религия, которую исповедует §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, доступна для игры
Население всех земель, которыми лично обладает §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, примет §Y[sponsoring_king.GetReligionFullName]§!.
Послать письмо с просьбой поддержать массов[Root.GetBaptismPostfixAndNameACC] §Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ского§! населения, которое получит §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
Принятие более цивилизованной религии поможет Вам укрепить государство и оставить позади пережитки прошлого.

При поддержке правителя [sponsoring_king.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ских земель, [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] принес[converting_king.GetNoneE] своему народу [converting_king.GetReligionFullName].

B этот день [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] принес[converting_king.GetNoneE] своему народу [sponsoring_king.GetReligionFullName], обратившись за поддержкой к мудрому правителю, коим и является [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName].

При поддержке правителя [sponsoring_king.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ских земель, [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] принес[converting_king.GetNoneE] своему народу [converting_king.GetReligionFullName].

Глубокоуважаем[Root.GetAyaYy] [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
Я решил[From.GetEndA] отказаться от старой веры и показать своим подданным величие [Root.GetReligionNameGEN].
Смиренно прошу Вас помочь мне в массовом [Root.GetBaptismNamePREP] моей страны.
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] и [From.GetTitledFirstName] подпишут пакт о ненападении между собой. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] поможет в обращении [From.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ского населения в новую веру.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] ответит отказом. [From.GetTitledFirstName] получит от н[Root.GetHersHis] сообщение о том, что [Root.GetSheHe] не заинтересован в обращении [From.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ского населения в [Root.GetReligionFullName].

[Root.GetTitledFirstName].
Ваши стремления привести свой народ к истинной вере поистине благородны, и я был[From.GetEndA] бы рад[From.GetEndA] помочь реализовать их, но к сожалению, сейчас это невозможно.
С уважением,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]

[Root.GetTitledFirstName].
Для меня честь ответить на Ваши мольбы и помочь [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]скому народу принять истинную веру.
Мы начнём приготовления немедленно.
С уважением,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! отправит [From.GetRelAdj]ских священников, чтобы подготовить церемонию массового обращения в новую веру.
Все вассалы §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ского§! государства будут приглашены на церемонию.

The conversion of [converting_king.Capital.GetName] starts on a cold morning.\nThe Bishop leading [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s embassy meets you at a river near the city. Your faithful vassals stand beside you, while the rest of your subjects wait their turn behind them, looking still visibly confused. The Bishop recites a few verses from [catholic.GetScriptureName] before you lead your vassals into the river. As you pass the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] priests they baptize you, one after the other, in the cold water. It takes some prodding from the guards to convince the peasants to follow you into the water, but, after a while, the entire crowd stands soaked and shaking by the riverside, just in time to watch the priests and their helpers drop your old idols into the waves.\n"As the false visages are swallowed by the tides" the Bishop proclaims, "may their memory forever be banished from your soul."

[sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName] отправил[sponsoring_king.GetEndA] к Вам делегацию имамов. Сегодня Вы встретили их на центральной площади [converting_king.Capital.GetHoldingGenericPlaceGEN] [converting_king.Capital.County.GetBaseName], куда прибыли и Ваши вассалы.\nОбратившись к толпе простолюдинов, собравшейся вокруг, Вы публично отвергли старых богов, демонстративно плюнули на идолов, и велели своим вассалом сделать то же самое. Как только возражения из толпы были подавлены, имамы подожгли запретные изображения людей и животных, а Вы заявили о своей вере в Аллаха и Его Пророка, после чего все стали на колени и поклонились в сторону Мекки.

[sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName] прислал[sponsoring_king.GetEndA] группу жрецов, которая прибыла на рассвете, но церемония началась только на закате, когда они помогли разместить образы новых богов в Вашем храме.\nТолпа Ваших подданных, среди которых были и могущественные вассалы, собралась в заранее обозначенном месте, чтобы принять участие в церемонии. Под гул рогов и эхо барабанов жрецы начали ритуал. Раскрасив лица кровью жертвенного ягнёнка, они сожгли священные растения и прочитали тайные заклинания, чтобы ввести всех присутствующих в транс.\nВидения ужаса и восторга сопровождали Вас до конца ночи. Когда Вы проснулись на рассвете следующего дня, жрецы уже ушли. Со временем толпа новообращенных мирно разошлась по домам.

Жрецы, которых прислал[sponsoring_king.GetEndA] [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName], дали Вам чёткие указания, и, следуя им, Вы оседлали своего лучшего коня и на рассвете отправились за пределы [converting_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ских земель вместе со своими верными вассалами.\nИзбегая на своём пути дорог и деревень, вы должны были добраться до места, о положении которого не было известно заранее.\nВесь день проведя в седле, вы, наконец, остановились у края обрыва, с которого вам открылся прекрасный вид заходящего солнца. Жрецы подожгли часть запасов продовольствия, чтобы совершить подношение Небу. Огня было немного, но тёмный дым столбом поднимался от костра под их зачаровывающие напевы. Вместе с вассалами Вы верхом проскочили через этот дым, который очистил вас от связи со старыми богами.

[sponsoring_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ские жрецы настояли, чтобы ритуал был совершён на закате. Когда время пришло, Вы встретили своих вассалов на вершине утёса за пределами [converting_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ских земель, где уже собралась огромная толпа Ваших подданных.\nЦеремония началась напевами и игрой на священных инструментах. Когда последние лучи солнца исчезли за горизонтом, Вы вместе со своими вассалами громогласно заявили о смерти своих старых богов, а затем отметили этот торжественный момент пением и танцами, которое жрецы поддерживали даже тогда, когда большая часть толпы уже валилась с ног от усталости. На сделующее утро они сказали, что Вы переродились и теперь под защитой [sponsoring_king.GetReligionHighGodGEN].

[sponsoring_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ские жрецы настояли, чтобы ритуал был совершён на закате. Когда время пришло, Вы встретили своих вассалов на вершине утёса за пределами [converting_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ских земель, где уже собралась огромная толпа Ваших подданных.\nЖрецы соорудили большой костёр с подношениями, чтобы умилостивить духов. Когда последние лучи солнца исчезли за горизонтом, Вы вместе со своими вассалами громогласно заявили о смерти своих старых богов, а затем отметили этот торжественный момент пением и танцами, которое жрецы поддерживали даже тогда, когда большая часть толпы уже валилась с ног от усталости. На заре нового дня столб дыма рассеялся, и они провозгласили, что [sponsoring_king.GetHighGodName] принял[sponsoring_king.GetHGodEndA] Ваше предложение и приветствует Вас под своей защитой.

[sponsoring_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ские жрецы настояли, чтобы ритуал был совершён на закате. Когда время пришло, Вы встретили своих вассалов на вершине утёса за пределами [converting_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ских земель, где уже собралась огромная толпа Ваших подданных.\nЖрецы начали церемонию барабанным боем, чтобы заслужить благоволение бога грома. Когда последние лучи солнца исчезли за горизонтом, Вы вместе со своими вассалами громогласно заявили о смерти своих старых богов, а затем отметили этот торжественный момент пением и танцами, которое жрецы поддерживали даже тогда, когда большая часть толпы уже валилась с ног от усталости. На сделующее утро они сказали, что Вы переродились и теперь под защитой [sponsoring_king.GetReligionHighGodGEN].

Следуя указаниям [ацтек]ских жрецов, Вы привели на [converting_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]скую площадь группу осуждённых за тяжкие преступления, где уже собралась толпа Ваших подданных.\nЖрецы надели на них слепые маски, изображающие старых богов, а на Вас и Ваших вассалов - наряды новых.\nЗатем перепуганных преступников освободили, и в ритуальной схватке Вы со своими вассалами убили их на глазах изумлённой толпы. Омыв себя их кровью, вы громогласно заявили о своей верности богам Запада.

Длинная процессия [sponsoring_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ских шаманов, несущих бесчисленное множество идолов, сегодня утром прибыла в [converting_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ские земли.\nВы встретили их на центральной площади вместе со своими вассалами в окружении толпы Ваших подданных, где открыто заявили, что отрекаетесь от старых богов, чтобы принять новых. Вы поклонились и поцеловали ноги каждому идолу, которого жрецы занесли в храм, после чего они рассказали о реакции богов и умиротворили гнев некоторых из них громким барабанным боем.

Роскошное шествие [sponsoring_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ских жрецов, несущих высокую сияющую статую бога солнца в [converting_king.Capital.GetHoldingGenericPlace] [converting_king.Capital.County.GetBaseName], ознаменовало начало грандиозной церемонии.\nВы со своими вассалами встретили их в окружении толпы простолюдинов и отреклись от старых богов, а затем поклонились золотому идолу.\nВы и Ваши вассалы по очереди совершили подношения новому богу в виде золота и драгоценных камней, покрыв его статую роскошными одеяниями, а потом и некоторые люди из толпы присоединились к вам, оставив свои скромные дары у ног идола. По окончанию церемонии, украшенную статую нового бога занесли в храм.

[sponsoring_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ские жрецы прибыли в [converting_king.Capital.GetHoldingGenericPlace] [converting_king.Capital.County.GetBaseName] за несколько дней до церемонии, чтобы установить статуи новых богов.\nВечером накануне ритуала Вы со своими вассалами прибыли в храмовый сад, где жрецы раздели вас догола, сбрили все волосы с ваших тел и омыли их. На следующее утро Вы встретили жрецов у входа в храм, где собралась толпа Ваших подданных, чтобы наблюдать за принесением в жертву богам дюжины быков. Жрецы внесли подношения в храм, а затем, спустя долгий час, они, наконец, покинули своё святилище и обратились к растерянной толпе с заявлением, что боги приняли дары и впредь будут принимать их.

[sponsoring_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ские жрецы прибыли в [converting_king.Capital.GetHoldingGenericPlace] [converting_king.Capital.County.GetBaseName] за несколько дней до церемонии, чтобы поселиться в новом храме.\nОставшиеся до главного события дни Вы с Вашими вассалами провели за подготовкой к нему, слушая нескончаемый список правил и ритуалов, которые по настоянию жрецов вы должны знать наизусть, чтобы правильно почитать [sponsoring_king.GetReligionHighGodACC]. В итоге, когда наступил день массового обращения, церемония выглядела чем-то второстепенным на фоне изнурительных приготовлений. На глазах у толпы жрецы избавились от образов старых богов и позволили Вам публично отречься от них, после чего скрылись в храме, чтобы вернуться к своим загадочным ритуалам.

[sponsoring_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ские раввины прибыли ясным утром.\nВы встретили их на [converting_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ской площади с группой верных вассалов в окружении толпы Ваших подданных. Согласно указаниям раввинов Вы установили три высоких пьедестала и назначили трёх судей, которые заняли на них свои места. Вы были перв[Root.GetOyYm], кого вызвали на бейт-дин, и казалось, судьи целую вечность проверяли искренность Вашего желания принять новую веру, после чего они занялись Вашими вассалами, проверяя их, пока толпа молчаливо наблюдала за ходом процесса.

Вас удивило, что [sponsoring_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ские священники прибыли в Вашу столицу как скромные гости, не устраивая пышную процессию.\nОни попросили Вас провести с ними несколько дней перед церемонией, чтобы как следует всё обдумать в спокойной обстановке, а сами убрали изображения старых богов из Вашего храма и рассказали Вам об обязанностях, которые лягут на Ваши плечи после принятия [sponsoring_king.GetReligionNameGEN]. В день церемонии Вы встретили своих вассалов на открытом месте в окружении толпы простолюдинов. Сняв с себя все регалии, вы сели вокруг костра, чтобы помедитировать под монотонный напев [sponsoring_king.GetRelAdj]ских священников.

Спустя несколько дней после массов[sponsoring_king.GetBaptismPostfixAndNameGEN] Вы получили письмо от своих миссионеров. В нём они сообщили, что несмотря на их сомнения в искренности новообращённых, после [converting_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ской церемонии [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] теперь официально [sponsoring_king.GetRelAdj]ская страна.\nОбратив единовременно так много язычников в истинную веру, Вы совершили подвиг, достойный самих апостолов.

Хотя Пророк часто распространял Его Слово мечом, для Вас обратить великое множество язычников лишь силой этого слова - самый настоящий подвиг.\nНесмотря на то, что в [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ском государстве ещё скрывается много неверных, Вы не сомневаетесь, что [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] и [converting_king.GetHersHis] ближайшее окружение приведут своих подданных к истинной вере. [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] теперь официально исповедует [sponsoring_king.GetReligionFullName], что на шаг приближает Вас к мировому господству [_ислама].

Жрецы, которых Вы послали в [converting_king.Capital.County.GetAdjective]ские земли, вернулись домой усталые, но довольные.\n[converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ские жители полностью приняли новых богов. Их воины пополнят армию Одина в Вальхалле, когда начнётся последняя война.\nСвоими действиями Вы обрели нового союзника в вечной борьбе против тех, кто стремится приблизить конец времён.

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

The road forward is clear: I must depose the corrupted [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] throne in order to earn my crown. Only once this war has been won will I be able to continue with the preparations for my anointment.

The road forward is clear: I must mend the schism brewing within the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church by removing the Anti-pope that is currently challenging the authority of [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. In order to do so, I must wage war against [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Only once this war has been won will I be able to continue with the preparations for my anointment.

With the wicked ruler forced into exile, the Pope has finally accepted to crown me [Root.GetTitle]. It is time to sheathe our weapons and let the celebrations begin.

With the false Pope forced to abandon his unholy quest for power, and with full dignity restored to the Church, the Pope has finally accepted to crown me [Root.GetTitle]. It is time to sheathe our weapons and let the celebrations begin.

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Before I can recognize your divine right to rule, you must deliver back under Papal control some Italian lands being currently withheld by a wicked ruler against Our wishes, a clear violation of the sacred agreement between Emperor Pepin and Pope Stephanus II.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
You shall have your lands back.

The Christian Pope has decided to call one of his lackeys to arms against me, in an attempt to reclaim some of the Italian lands currently under my control. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has just declared war against me on the Pope's behalf.

The Papal State has decided to press some of its ancient claims over Italy by enlisting the help of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. If our armies are defeated in the coming war, we will all be forced to submit to the rule of the Supreme Pontiff.
The road forward is clear: I must press the Church's claim over [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and restore [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s lands to Papal rule if I wish to be crowned [Root.GetTitle].
And reclaim these lands I shall.

I have successfully wrestled Papal lands from infidel control and delivered them back under the blessed authority of the Holy See. Such an act has certainly ensured me a place in Heaven, or at the very least the gratitude of the Pope.

I have successfully wrestled Papal lands from infidel control and delivered them back under the blessed authority of the Holy See. Now that this war is over, it is finally time for me to receive my crown.

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Your request is frankly ludicrous. Emperor Constantine gave full control of the Western Empire to the Papacy when he decided to move his court to the Eastern Provinces. If you wish to have a crown, I urge you to openly submit to the Holy See.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

As such is the will of the Holy See, I decided to formally submit myself and my Empire to the sacred authority of the Universal Church. From now and forever more, His Holiness [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and His successors will have control over our lands, as it was intended by Emperor Constantine when he originally split the Roman Empire.

The Holy See has seen fit to press its ancient claim over my lands, and, in [From.GetHerHis] wisdom, my liege has decided to grant him his request. As such, it appears I have now become a vassal of the Holy See.
Surely it is for the best?
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has died: with [From.GetHerHim] gone I must find another priest to anoint me [Root.GetTitle].
Now that I have a distinguished member of the [Root.Religion.GetName] clergy to officiate my coronation, I must decide how much I wish to spend on the ceremony leading up to it.

Разослать приглашения всем Вашим вассалам, а также [Root.GetRelAdj]ским монархам соседних государств, на пышную церемонию и великолепный пир, посвящённый Вашей коронации.

My dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Only a few more days before I am crowned [Root.GetTitle] before God and all my subjects. My court has been already filled with all my distinguished guests, both vassals and foreign dignitaries come to bear witness to this fundamental moment of my reign. Such a lavish ceremony with so prestigious guests is a rare spectacle to behold even amongst royalty.

The time of my coronation draws near: only a few more days before I am crowned [Root.GetTitle] before God and all my subjects. My court has been already filled with all the vassals of my realm who have come to bear witness to this fundamental moment of my reign.

The time of my coronation draws near: only a few more days before I am crowned [Root.GetTitle] before God and all my subjects. It will be a long wait with very little to do, but I hope at least that this period of seclusion will give me time to ponder upon my future responsibilities as [Root.GetTitle].

Organizing such a monumental ceremony has given me the chance to better know the rulers of the realms neighboring [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Maintaining healthy relationships with my Christian peers is fundamental to ensure the future peace and prosperity of my realm. [potential_friend.GetTitledFirstName] in particular seems like a [potential_friend.GetManWoman] I could really trust...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has spared no expenses for [From.GetHerHis] coronation. As I was admiring the lavish sights offered by [From.GetHerHis] palace, I was approached by the [From.GetTitle] [From.GetHerselfHimself]. After having talked to [From.GetHerHim] for a while, I am starting to think we might have a lot in common...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has cheerfully accepted my offer of friendship. I was not wrong putting my trust in [From.GetHerHim], and now, thanks to this fortuitous meeting, we have both ensured a lasting peace between our two realms.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has cheerfully accepted my offer for friendship. I was not wrong in putting my trust in [From.GetHerHim], and now, thanks to this fortuitous meeting, I have further guaranteed the stability of my realm.

Organizing such a great ceremony has given me the chance to know better some of my vassals. Maintaining healthy relationships with all my subjects is fundamental to ensure the future stability and prosperity of my realm. [potential_friend.GetTitledFirstName] in particular seems like a [potential_friend.GetManWoman] I could really trust...

Meeting new rulers and exchanging ideas about politics and royal virtues has been an interesting consequence of this ceremony. Everybody has at least one anecdote to share with me about the proper way to rule a Kingdom. I wonder which is closer to the truth...
Fostering good relations with one's neighbors and subjects is paramount.
Proper handling of the realm's finances is fundamental.

During the evening, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has remarked on multiple occasions of how it is important for a new ruler to create stable diplomatic relationships with [From.GetHerHis] peers and subjects in order to ensure peace and prosperity for everyone. [From.GetHerHisCap] show of dialectics has been a revelation for all the guests.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has entertained [From.GetHerHis] guests during the evening with a remarkable show of knowledge in the matters of State. While tedious to a few of the guests, some of the ideas we all discussed about how to improve and solidify a realm's economy were quite inspirational.

[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName]'s presence for my upcoming coronation has lured an entire flock of scholars and theologians in my court. While most of them keep their distance from the nobility, I have had the chance to overhear a few of them discussing about the most intriguing, metaphysical subjects during the evening.
I will keep listening to them in the shadows.

The night at [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s court took a strange turn when our host decided to call some of the clergymen and scholars at the nobles' table, engaging with them in a long discussion about theology. I did not expect this feast to turn into a lesson about Christianity, but...
...I might be learning something useful tonight.

With so many distinguished guests having traveled all the way to my court, the least I could do is entertain them while we all wait for the day of my coronation. This could also provide me with an opportunity to impress some of my more influential guests.
Having all the important grownups in my palace is great opportunity to show them that I am just as smart and wise as any [Root.GetTitle] no matter how old I am.
I do not want to embarrass myself before the ceremony.

Whatever doubts I might have had about my performance were completely unfounded: my speech about the duties of a good [Root.GetTitle] to [Root.GetHerHis] subjects was poignant and extremely well received.
When I started I was shaking a bit, but, after I finished listing all the responsibilities my tutor taught me about being a good [Root.GetTitle], all my guests applauded and congratulated me.
Вы получите §G+10§! к мнению всех гостей о Вас благодаря Вашего выступления.

Despite my best efforts, my speech about the duties of a good [Root.GetTitle] to [Root.GetHerHis] subjects was received a bit too coldly compared to my expectations. Perhaps I should have used less platitudes and talked about something more substantive...

Just while I was in the middle of listing the duties of a good [Root.GetTitle] like my tutor taught me, somebody in the crowd coughed and I lost my concentration! After a few failed attempts at resuming my speech, I was too embarrassed to continue and left the room covering my face.
Ugh, this could have gone better.
Вы получите §R-10§! к мнению всех гостей о Вас из-за Вашего выступления.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to call for the attention of all [From.GetHerHis] guests before tonight's dinner and spent a great deal of time decanting the virtues of a good [From.GetTitle]. [From.GetHerHisCap] speech was passionate and on point, enough to convince many of the people present that [From.GetSheHe] will be an extraordinary ruler.

The young [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to call for the attention of all [From.GetHerHis] guests before tonight's dinner and spent a great deal of time listing the virtues of a good [From.GetTitle]. [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to call for the attention of all [From.GetHerHis] guests before tonight's dinner and spent a great deal of time decanting the virtues of a good [From.GetTitle]. I can almost feel the weight of the crown over my head already, but it is far from burdensome: I feel reinvigorated by the prospect of finally becoming [Root.GetTitle]. Thinking about my new responsibilities as an anointed ruler fills me with trepidation.

With all this pomp and circumstance, all these lavish preparations, and with my coronation so close, I am finally starting to understand the weight and importance of my role as [Root.GetTitle]. People expect great things of me.

Everybody is so kind and respectful to me, even a lot of important people that I only met a few days ago. This Coronation Ceremony is a lot more important than I had thought. It is really great to be a [Root.GetTitle]!

[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] approached me tonight to personally inform me of how satisfied [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] is with the great month of festivity I have organized to accompany my coronation. [coronation_priest.GetSheHeCap] wanted to be sure that I knew of how welcome [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] feels at my court, and that [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] expects great things of me.

[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] took some time after dinner to take me aside and give me a long talk about what my new responsibilities will be after [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] crowns me Holy Roman Emperor. [coronation_priest.GetSheHeCap] warned me that being the heir to Charlemagne, as well as the protector of all Christendom will be a colossal undertaking, and that I should always strive to do my best to live up to the charge.

Late this evening, as the servants were clearing up our tables, [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] decided to talk to me about my new responsibilities after the coronation: as a [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle], I will be sworn to care for the secular needs of all my subjects as well as to stand against the tide of sin and heresy beseeching our world.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was happy to learn more about [From.GetHerHis] upcoming responsibilities as a [From.GetTitle] from me. It was not enough to learn that [From.GetTitledFirstName] was at [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s celebration: tonight, in the middle of dinner, my old rival decided to insult me in front of my host and many of the other guests!

I would be quite enjoying my visit at [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s court if it were not for [From.GetTitledFirstName] constant harassment. The [From.GetManWoman] is clearly jealous of my accomplishments as [Root.GetTitle], and cannot stop trying to besmirch my reputation, hoping it would make [From.GetHerHim] feel better about [From.GetHerselfHimself].

A heated argument has sparked between [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetTitledFirstName], two of my distinguished foreign guests. Whatever their reasons, this diplomatic incident could be a stain on the legitimacy of this ceremony if not properly handled.

Thanks to my diplomatic skills I was able to not only stop the argument between the two rival rulers from escalating, but to also mend their disagreements permanently. We talked long after the dinner was over and when the two of them retired to their rooms for the night they professed that they have found a new friend in me.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to interfere with the argument I was in. [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to interfere with the argument I was in. [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to interfere in the argument I was in. While [From.GetHerHis] intentions were good, [From.GetHerHis] attempt to mend the disagreements I have with my rival was fruitless. This is no problem that can be fixed with a simple talk.

Unfortunately, my attempt to help my two guests calm down were unsuccessful. Even worse, at the end of the dinner, I had somehow managed to convince both [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetTitledFirstName] that I was as much an enemy to them as they were to each other.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to interfere in the argument I was in. As if that was not embarrassing enough, I am now certain that [From.GetSheHe] favored my rival's reasons over mine, a clear breach of [From.GetHerHis] duty as host to be welcoming to all [From.GetHerHis] guests.

There [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] goes again, scolding [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s guests with another sermon. It has been days now since I have had to put up with [coronation_priest.GetHerHis] endless moralizing, I cannot really take anymore of it.
I will shut [coronation_priest.GetHerHim] up this time!

My celebrations have been interrupted by a heated argument between [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] about the nature of devotion. I should probably put a stop to this before things escalate further.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to interfere with my argument with [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to interfere with my argument with [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName], and predictably, the [From.GetTitle]-to-be decided to take the side of the [coronation_priest.GetTitle]. [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to interfere with my argument with [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName], and surprisingly, the [From.GetTitle]-to-be took my side, going against the [coronation_priest.GetTitle] who is supposed to crown [From.GetHerHim] only a few days from now.

This morning, a curious visitor came to my court: he is a wandering knight who traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName] after hearing news of my upcoming coronation. He has proclaimed that he wishes to pledge his sword to my service. He is ready and eager to serve a [Root.GetTitle] as wise and renown as I am to his death.

This morning a curious visitor came to my court: he is a wandering knight who traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName] after hearing news of my upcoming coronation. He has proclaimed that he wishes to pledge his loyalty to me and protect my honor from all offenders. He is ready and eager to defend the reputation of a [Root.GetTitle] whose virtue is as renown as mine to his death.

This morning a curious visitor came to my court: he is a wandering knight who traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName] after hearing news of my upcoming coronation. He has proclaimed that he wishes to pledge his loyalty to me and protect me from any who would attempt to harm me. He is ready and eager to join the ranks of my bodyguards and shield my life with his.
Begone, I do not know you.

It was hard to notice at first, but, after spending a few days with him in my service, I have come to realize that [coronation_knight.GetFirstName]'s devotion to me goes well beyond the boundaries of loyalty between a knight and his [Root.GetTitle]. Tonight, I pressed the issue with him, only to have [coronation_knight.GetTitledFirstName] kneel at my feet and profess his undying love for me.
Can we not just be friends instead?
Unacceptable. You are relieved of duty.

Giving into my lust for [coronation_knight.GetTitledFirstName] may have been a poor choice, especially at this time: with the court so filled with guests for my impending coronation, somebody ended up spotting the two of us while we were consuming our illicit relationship in the gardens. Now, the entire palace is ablaze with vicious rumors about me.

Rumors have reached me that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has fallen in love with a black knight who only arrived at her court a few days ago. Stories about her illicit escapades with this stranger of low birth put a notable stain on [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s reputation: why should she engage in such a vile behavior, especially when so close to her sacred coronation?
She should be ashamed of herself.

It has been a great idea allowing [coronation_knight.GetTitledFirstName] to join my court. He knows so much about fighting! He has told me all sorts of stories about the countless wars he has fought in, and he has even offered to teach me some of his tricks, if I can spare him some time.
Yes! I want to know how to fight like you!
Nah, I am not interested in that stuff.

This morning, a curious visitor came to my court: a wandering scholar who traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName] after hearing news of my upcoming coronation. He claims that he has heard many tales of what a wise and virtuous ruler I am, and wishes to put his knowledge to my service.
I am sure we have much to share, [coronation_scholar.GetTitledFirstName].
I do not deal with beggars and charlatans.

Everybody is praising [From.GetTitledFirstName], everybody is saying what a great [From.GetTitle] [From.GetSheHe] will make... If nothing else, this Coronation Ceremony has really made me realize how much I despise that [From.GetManWoman].

Everybody is praising [From.GetTitledFirstName], everybody is saying what a great [From.GetTitle] [From.GetSheHe] will make... I cannot stand the sight of my old rival being showered with compliments. Being invited to [From.GetHerHis] moment of glory was an insult of its own, really.
I have had enough of this farce!
I must be quiet and endure it.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to make a scene during tonight's feast. Perhaps inviting my old rival to my coronation might have been a bad idea...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to pick a fight with me during tonight's feast. For whatever reason, [From.GetSheHe] has come to the conclusion that I am an ungrateful hypocrite.
I am sure I can settle this matter.

In a surprising show of kindness, [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to listen to my grievances against [From.GetHerHim] and promised to improve [From.GetHerHis] behavior towards me in the future. Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] is not such a bad person after all...
Let us not be enemies any longer.
I am soon to become [Root.GetTitle], yet here I am, alone in my palace, with only a few servants to celebrate what is supposed to be one of the most important days of my life.

However justified my reasons were to organize a secluded ceremony for my coronation, rather than waste money and time on feasts and entertainment, my vassals are far from pleased. Not only do they perceive it as a sign of weakness, but they all seem to have taken their lack of invitation as a personal slight against them!

I have only heard of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s pending coronation after the news spread across the realm. It seems that the [From.GetTitle] has organized a very secluded ceremony for [From.GetHerHis] coronation, granting invitations only to [From.GetHerHis] most inner circle of advisors.

After growing increasingly hostile in the past few days, tonight [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] officially stated [coronation_priest.GetHerHis] disappointment at my lack of hospitality, publicly berating me in front of my Council and servants for how poor and secluded this coronation is.
Yet, should a Christian not eschew excesses?
This is very rude of [coronation_priest.GetHerHim] to say.

It came to me as no surprise that [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] was disappointed with the secluded ceremony my liege organized for [From.GetHerHis] coronation. The [coronation_priest.GetTitle] probably hoped for a much more grandiose ceremony.
What will wearing a crown change when nobody is even here to see me be anointed [Root.GetTitle]? Is my realm destined to be as hollow and forgettable as this ceremony is going to be?
I should just be content with what I have, I suppose...
Why should I even care about ruling?

Spending the days leading up to my coronation in seclusion has given me time to meditate about my duties as a [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle]. Perhaps I have been too egoistical in the past, perhaps this ceremony is my chance to be a humbler, kinder ruler...

As I spend my evenings alone, counting the days left before my coronation, I cannot shake the feeling that I would have been able to afford a more lavish ceremony if it were not for [lazy_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]'s mismanagement of the realm's finances...
It is all the Steward's fault!
It is too late to point fingers now.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] accused me of mismanaging the realm's finances! [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that, if it were not for my poor handling of the realm's treasury we would have been able to organize a much more grandiose ceremony for [From.GetHerHis] coronation.

I kneel before [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] as a host of Electors and vassals surrounds us in complete silence. The Pope blesses me as he prepares himself to place the Imperial Crown upon my head and proclaim me [coronation_ruler.GetTitle] of the Romans by grace of God, and protector of all Christendom.

I kneel before [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] as host of vassals surrounds us in complete silence. The Pope blesses me before placing the Imperial Crown upon my head and proclaiming me [coronation_ruler.GetTitle] of [coronation_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName] by grace of God.

I kneel before [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] with all my reverently silent vassals surrounding us. He then proclaims me [coronation_ruler.GetTitle] of [coronation_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName] by grace of God.

[coronation_priest.GetSheHe] then proclaims me [coronation_ruler.GetTitle] of [coronation_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName] by grace of God.

[coronation_ruler.GetFullName] has been crowned [coronation_ruler.GetTitle] by [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName], thus legitimizing [coronation_ruler.GetHerHis] divine right to rule.

With the ceremony finally concluded and every guest returned home, I can resume my duties as [Root.GetTitle]: now that I have officially received the blessing of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church, the legitimacy of my divine right to rule is beyond doubt.
With the ceremony finally concluded, [From.GetTitledFirstName] bid me farewell and dismissed me from [From.GetHerHis] court, alongside all [From.GetHerHis] other guests.
It is good to be back in [Root.Capital.GetName].

The Pope was baffled when I reached for the Imperial Crown in the middle of the ceremony and snatched away the golden circlet from his hands. Amongst the general amazement of the crowd of noblemen around us, I announced that from this day forward the Papacy would hold no longer any power over the Imperial throne, as it was the case for all Roman Emperors of old.

The Pope was baffled when [coronation_ruler.GetTitledFirstName] reached for the Imperial Crown in the middle of the ceremony and snatched away the golden circlet from his hands. Amongst the general amazement of the large crowd of noblemen gathered around them, [coronation_ruler.GetTitledFirstName] announced that from [coronation_ruler.GetHerHis] reign forward the Papacy would hold no longer any power over the Imperial throne, as it was the case for all Roman Emperors of old.

I have received the most damning rumors about [coronation_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]'s Coronation Ceremony. According to most reports, the [coronation_ruler.GetTitle] to be threw [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] out of [coronation_ruler.GetHerHis] palace's balcony, proclaimed [coronation_ruler.GetHerHim]self to be [coronation_ruler.GetTitle] by [coronation_ruler.GetHerHis] own will, and proceeded to reveal [coronation_ruler.GetHerHim]self as the Antichrist.
I am [Root.GetTitle] by my own hand!
With the unexpected death of the priest meant to officiate the ceremony, it looks like [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been forced to postpone [From.GetHerHis] Coronation indefinitely.
Эт[_от] [__персонаж] путешествует и сейчас вдали от своего дома.
Not my problem. [From.GetHerHisCap] mother will deal with this.
В этом округе экономический бум благодаря недавнему празднованию.
Местные жители этого округа продолжают праздновать коронацию своего монарха.

Это[GetYMu] [GetAgedPersonDAT] не хватает легитимности из-за того, что [GetSheHe] не был[GetEndA] коронован[GetEndA]. Этот факт не может не сказываться негативно на дипломатических усилиях страны в целом.

The people of [Root.Capital.GetName] are growing more and more restless every year. A [Root.GetTitle] who has not been anointed by the Church will never be seen as legitimate in the eye of any good [Root.Religion.GetName].

Month after month, I receive news about another one of the Bishops of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] accusing me of wickedness during one of his sermons. For as long as I have not been officially crowned [Root.GetTitle], the clergy will take every opportunity to further undermine my rule.
But they are still vassals of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
Объяснить, что несмотря на личные предпочтения, святой долг §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ского§! духовенства - служить своему новому сюзерену, а значит принести ему клятву верности.
These accusation have no theological basis!
Воспользоваться знанием священного писания, чтобы опровергнуть обвинения духовенства в Ваш адрес по поводу нехватки легитимности.
A generous donation to the Church will shut them up.
Подкупить духовенство, чтобы заставить его замолчать на какое-то время.
I only need a few months more...

I cannot believe my [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has still not managed to be officially crowned [From.GetTitle]. Not only is [From.GetHerHis] display of weakness a threat to realm peace: tales of [From.GetHerHis] incompetence will surely drag my name in the mud alongside [From.GetHerHis].
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§! услышит Ваши упрёки в отсутствии законности [From.GetHersHis] правления.

My [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetFirstName] stormed my private study this evening, berating me for not having managed to legitimize my rule over [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] with a proper Coronation Ceremony yet.
Dear, allow me to at least explain the issue clearly.
Rather than fighting, could we not do something more relaxing?

The nerve of [From.GetFirstName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] dared to deflect my just criticisms of [From.GetHerHis] misconduct by pointing out that I have also yet to prove my legitimacy as [Root.GetTitle] before God. Sometimes I truly cannot stand [From.GetHerHim].

After listening to my harsh words, [From.GetFirstName] assured me that [From.GetSheHe] understands perfectly the severity of our situation and has already put in motion [From.GetHerHis] plans to solve the issue as soon as possible.
Maybe I should give [From.GetHerHim] another chance...

As I was berating [From.GetFirstName] for [From.GetHerHis] failings as [From.GetTitle], [From.GetSheHe] decided to drown my complaints in a kiss, and whispered to me that I should stop my bickering and join [From.GetHerHim] in [From.GetHerHis] chambers instead.
It seems my [From.GetRootRelation] was not in the mood tonight. My attempt to distract [From.GetHerHim] from the issue of my pending coronation did not end quite well...

My liege's rule has yet to be properly legitimized by the holy right of coronation. I must inform [From.GetHerHim] that [From.GetHerHis] current condition is becoming a hindrance to my work as Chancellor of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
[From.GetSheHeCap] will not like to hear this...
My Chancellor informed me today that my prolonged lack of legitimization in the eyes of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church is seriously damaging all diplomatic missions of my realm.
I must find somebody to crown me soon...

I can no longer suffer to serve under a wicked [From.GetTitle] who has yet to have [From.GetHerHis] rule be legitimized by the blessing of the Church. It is time that I make my disapproval known beyond doubt.
I will no longer serve in your Council!
Maybe I should give [From.GetHerHim] some more time...

In a brazen display of disrespect, [From.GetTitledFirstName] proclaimed that [From.GetSheHe] would no longer serve as the Court Chaplain of a wicked [Root.GetTitle] whose rule is still yet to be legitimized by the blessing of the Church.
I must find somebody to crown me soon...

Some time has passed, but I still cannot come to terms with how modest and secluded my coronation has been. Is it worthy of an [Root.GetTitle] to have [Root.GetHerHis] divine right to rule be recognized in the most meager of fashions?
The Lord cares not for riches.
The Lord cares not for riches.

Though some time has now passed since my coronation, the good people of [Root.Capital.GetName] are still in a festive mood, glad to finally see their [Root.GetTitle]'s status be recognized by the Church. It would be nice to see my subjects continue to celebrate my rise to the throne, if it were not for the fact that they are also using this as an excuse to work less.
We could use the festivity to attract more traders.
Meh, let the rabble have their fun...
Word of the lavish period of celebration that surrounded my coronation has spread across the realm and beyond. My name will be forever associated with prestige and wealth.

The great celebrations that surrounded my coronation concluded a while ago, but the trade and wealth they have brought to [Root.Capital.GetName] are still lingering, an unexpected consequence of my generosity.

I am still thinking about [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s coronation. While I was forced by Fate to be crowned alone and in misery, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] flaunted [FromFrom.GetHerHis] munificence with all [FromFrom.GetHerHis] guests and put up a spectacle that will be remembered for years to come...

I am still thinking about [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s coronation. While I am yet to be anointed [Root.GetTitle], [FromFrom.GetFirstName] is already flaunting [FromFrom.GetHerHis] crown with all of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName]'s neighboring royalty after putting up a spectacle that will be remembered for years to come...
I should be glad with what I have.

Now that I am [Root.GetTitle], tradition demands that I travel to [Root.Liege.Capital.GetName] and offer homage to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], the divinely-appointed ruler of [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
I have just received news that [From.GetTitledFirstName] will not come to [Root.Capital.GetName] and pay homage to [From.GetHerHis] rightful liege, as is tradition.
I have been informed that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has come to [Root.Capital.GetName] and has requested an audience with me in order to pay me homage, as is tradition for a newly-appointed vassal.
I do not have time to waste with the likes of [From.GetHerHim].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was courteous enough to accept my homage and offer [From.GetHerHis] blessing as well. Now that this nuisance has been dealt with, I am free to return to my lands and rule in peace.
I was shocked to learn that [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to grant me an audience, especially after all the trouble I have gone through only to pay [From.GetHerHim] homage.

According to legend, nested within the Iron Crown of Lombardy rests one of the sacred nails used to crucify Our Lord. Yet, after wearing this crown on my head for years, I have yet to see any trace of it.
Perhaps I can pry it a little...
I do not need to see it to know that it's there.
[From.GetRootRelation]'s crown is amazing! [From.GetSheHeCap] says only the [From.GetTitle] can wear it, but I am [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetSonDaughter], and is that not close enough?

I was woken up this morning by disturbing news: a guard stormed in my bedchambers to warn me that my crown had been stolen. I was disconcerted to discover, only a few hours later, that my [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetFirstName] was the culprit. The foolish child is prancing around the Imperial gardens wearing the holy crown of Charlemagne.
I should teach [From.GetHerHim] about the sacred history of this crown.
Give me back the crown immediately, [From.GetSonDaughter]!
Eh, I will let the kid have [From.GetHerHis] fun...

My [From.GetRootRelation] caught me! Fortunately, [From.GetSheHe] was not too upset that I had taken [From.GetHerHis] crown. Instead, [From.GetSheHe] took me aside and told me a long story about the ancient Kings the crown belonged to before getting to [From.GetHerHim].

My [From.GetRootRelation] caught me! [From.GetSheHeCap] was really mad to discover that it was I who took [From.GetHerHis] crown. [From.GetSheHeCap] had me dragged back to my chambers and made me skip both lunch and dinner!
Вы сохраните своё §Yистинное вероисповедание§! и §Yтайные общины§! своих единоверцев на своих землях.
Коалиция против массового обращения в веру, которую навязывает §Y[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]§!.
Призвать к оружию всех истинно верующих, которые остались в стране.
Я слишком долго ждал[Root.GetEndA] этого момента. Пора открыто заявить о своих намерениях и разбить оковы новой веры.
До меня дошли вести о массовом обращении [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ского государства, ведущую роль в котором сыграл[sponsoring_king.GetEndA] [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName].
[sponsoring_king.GetSheHeCap] заслужил[sponsoring_king.GetEndA] вернуться в лоно Святой Матери Церкви.

Достопочтенн[Root.GetAyaYy] [Root.GetTitledFirstName].\nПриняв во внимание Ваши действия, способствующие массовому обращению [converting_king.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ских жителей в [Root.GetReligionFullName], Мы решили принять Вас в лоно Святой Матери Церкви.\n [From.GetTitledFirstName]
Мои добрые дела наконец-то оценили по достоинству!

Мне только что стало известно, что [From.GetTitledFirstName] - мудр[From.GetAyaYy] языческ[From.GetAyaIy] правител[From.GetEndNitsa], котор[From.GetAyaYy] обрати[From.GetLasLsya] ко мне с просьбой [From.GetHerHim] обратить свою страну в истинную веру, умер[From.GetNoneE].\nМогу только надеяться, что [From.GetHersHis] наследник окажется столь же просвещённым, как и [From.GetSheHe].

Мне только что стало известно, что [From.GetTitledFirstName] - мудр[From.GetAyaYy] языческ[From.GetAyaIy] правител[From.GetEndNitsa], котор[From.GetAyaYy] обраща[From.GetLasLsya] ко мне с просьбой [From.GetHerHim] обратить свою страну в истинную веру, умер[From.GetNoneE].\nК великому сожалению, [From.GetSheHe] сконча[From.GetLasLsya] как раз тогда, когда я решил[Root.GetEndA] нанести [From.GetHerHim] визит.
Пусть [From.GetTitledFirstName] узнает, что Вы рады [From.GetHersHis] приветствию.
Пусть [From.GetTitledFirstName] узнает, что Вы разочарованы [From.GetHersHis] приветствием.
Пусть [From.GetTitledFirstName] узнает, что Вы довольны оказанным Вам гостеприимством с [From.GetHersHis] стороны.
Пусть [From.GetTitledFirstName] узнает, что Вас оскорбляет низкий уровень [From.GetHersHis] гостеприимства.
[This.GetSheHe] умер[This.GetNoneE] от осложнений во время беременности
This character is left-handed. While seen with suspicion by the Christian Church, left-handed people tend to have a considerable advantage in combat.
Эт[_от] [__персонаж] стал[_] жертвой осложнений при тяжёлой беременности, что выражается в общей слабости и вынужденном постельном режиме.
Эт[_от] [__персонаж] проходит через сложный этап беременности. Действия, которые обычно не составляют труда, в данный момент выше [_его] сил.
Эт[_от] [__персонаж] находится на последней стадии беременности. В этом состоянии он[_] не может принимать участие в общественной жизни, по крайней мере, пока не пройдут роды.

Just then, in my hesitation, I glimpsed at the reflection of my Regent [From.GetFirstName], ominously spying on me from my chamber's door with expectation.

My plan did not work: [From.GetTitledFirstName] somehow managed to discover my plot to kill her moments before I set the plan in motion. She steadily screamed for help and her personal guards came in to arrest me.

My plan did not work: [From.GetTitledFirstName] somehow managed to discover my plot to kill her moments before I set the plan in motion. She steadily screamed for help and her personal guards came in to kill me on the spot.

I was hoping that I could finally have a night with a peaceful sleep when the contents of my stomach decided to strongly disagree. I was just about to stand up when I heard a rustle near my bed: I slowly opened my eyes to see [From.GetFirstName] standing beside me, holding a pillow over my face.

[From.GetFirstName] promised that [From.GetSheHe] will visit me every day until my labor comes to term to offer me all [From.GetHerHis] support and [From.GetHerHis] prayer for a speedy recovery and a healthy childbirth.
I cannot stand up, I cannot lay down, even the gentler action sends shivers of pain through my body. If I do not do something about it, this pregnancy might be the end of me.
I will call for my Court Physician.
I need to hire a healer.
A shaman will exorcise the evil spirits plaguing me.
I can do this on my own, I just need to endure the pain.
I turn again and again under my bedsheets, panting desperately for air. My throat has become dry and hoarse, making it even harder to breathe.

The servants take away the last bucket filled with my vomit, but they are not fast enough to place the new one under my face. As I puke all over my bed, the stench provokes a new surge of nausea, making me shiver violently.

I tear off another bush of hair from my chest, trying to stop myself from scratching my arms and legs some more. Despite my best efforts to stop it, since a few days now dozens of rashes and spots of disgusting fur have started to dot my skin.

I spit out the glass of water, and order one of my servants to try it again. As the pregnancy progressed, everything has started to taste progressively worse, to the point that now even the blandest of foods and beverages feel like rusted copper in my mouth.

I feel the touch of the servants covering me yet another time as I stir under my bedsheets, sweating and shivering. I have long since lost the sense of time since this fever has started tormenting me. In fact, I can barely tell if I am awake or not most of the times.

As I spend more days wasting away in my bedroom, tormented by this pregnancy, I am finding it a lot harder to focus on anything. Things that I thought obvious now slip away from my mind, and I can hardly remember the names of half the people I seen moving back and forth from my rooms.

Once again, I wake in the dead of night, covered in cold sweat, with my heart beating wildly and struggling to breathe. My throat is already sore, but I still manage to scream my lungs out for help. When the guards finally come in, it takes them some time to stop me from screaming entirely and to assure me that there is nothing I should be worrying about.
But I saw something! I saw..?

One of my servants hangs a dish filled with yet another delicacy below my nose, but I quickly push it aside in disgust. I have barely the strength left to breathe, let alone to chew anything, and the growing cramps from your womb are making me feel nauseous at every turn, so much so that has become really hard for me to eat anything at all.

I stir and drool, twisting uncontrollably in my bed, despite my servants' best efforts to hold me still. I hear voices, both worried and threatening, echo around me, but everything is blurry and I have no idea what is happening to me, nor why I am unable to stop screaming and foaming at the mouth.

The servants come once more to change the bedsheets soaked in my blood as I scream and fruitlessly grasp for something to hold onto as I try to ease the pain that coursing through every fiber of my body.
I let out a whimper when the tooth rolls over my bedsheets, and then moan through my closed mouth as I feel the metallic taste of blood fill my throat and more teeth loosen from my weakened gums.

Yet another servant girls falls asleep in the middle of her story as I keep staring at her, teeming with envy. It has been almost a week since I last managed to sleep properly. My eyes are bloodshot and my ears scream in pain at even the softest whisper.
I just want to rest! Even just an hour!

Some of the servants seem to have been really started to worry about me since a few weeks, but in truth, I have not felt this good since quite some time, especially after since the talking fox brought some of his friends in my bedchamber to entertain me with their delightful escapades.
Oh, Lord Butterfly, you are such a braggart!
I startle as a pair of hands drags me back from the edge of the balcony. How did I even get here? The last thing I recall was trying to find the right position to sleep without squashing my womb...
Who..? Who are you? Where am I?
Things seem to be finally improving. I have resumed to sleep and eat regularly and the cramps have subsided. I may be able to see this labor to its end after all...

The servants are working tirelessly around me, changing bloodied bedsheets and brushing blood and sweat off of me, but there seems to be no end to it. The bleeding will not stop and I am too weak to endure any more pain and deprivation.
Given the ominous circumstances of my birth, I am clearly no ordinary child.
The pregnancy has been a hellish torture, but its fruit at least seems to have been a strong and healthy baby.
As if the terrible pregnancy was not enough, there seems to be something wrong with my child as well.
The pregnancy is over, but I have yet to leave my chambers, scourged by a steaming fever which is leaving me shivering and burning under my bedsheets.

As I turn restlessly in my bed, I find another curl of hair laying severed amongst the sheets. There is no doubt anymore that the strain my pregnancy put me under is resulting in an alarming loss of hair.
My bleeding has yet to stop. Even with the child out, I am still experiencing frequent accesses, despite the best efforts of my healers to stop the flow of blood.
The horrific trial is finally over: I have fully recovered from the ordeal that was this pregnancy without any lasting scar.
I am a little bit tired still...
I am finally starting to recover from the ordeal of this labor, but there is no doubt that this experience has considerably weakened me.
I might not survive another labor.

Although my body is recovering from the pregnancy, the pain I endured has deeply scarred my mind. Every little sound puts me on alert and it is harder and harder to find the resolve to go outside of my room, even to perform the simplest task.
I am so tired and- what was it again?

I hoped the pain would be over with the child out of me, but the internal bleeding I have suffered by giving birth to [From.GetHerHim] has made everything worse. As I lay in my blood-soaked bed, the servant desperately try to preserve what little spark of life I have left as I slowly slip into unconsciousness.
My wife [From.GetFirstName] went through an extremely painful and dangerous labor, but she seems to have miraculously recovered from it without any permanent damage.
My wife [From.GetFirstName] went through an extremely painful and dangerous labor and, while she managed to survive it, she has been left weakened and fragile after the ordeal.
Is the womb still in working condition though?

My wife [From.GetFirstName] went through an extremely painful and dangerous labor and, while her body managed to survive largely unscathed, her mind was unfortunately shattered by the hellish experience.
At least the body is fine.
My wife [From.GetFirstName] did not survive her pregnancy, dying of complications during her labor.
At least she is at peace now.

The nightmare is not over yet for my wife: her recovery was only passing, her conditions have quickly worsened after giving birth to her child. If she does not get better soon, she will surely perish.
Labor is not going well. My wife is bleeding profusely and seems to be suffering great pains. If the bleeding does not stop soon she will surely perish.

My treatment is finally showing some results: my [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is sleeping and eating regularly again, and her cramps have subsidized. The pregnancy is not over yet, but she might be able to make it after all.
My [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is sleeping and eating regularly again, and she claims to be feeling better. The pregnancy is not over yet, but she might be able to make it after all.
A little sip here, a small bottle there, it might not be what is best for the child, but drinking more has definitely help me cope with the stress of this pregnancy.
I am not drinking *that* much anyway...

I feel a lot less under pressure since I stopped caring about what I eat. In fact, I have started to routinely look forward to gorge myself on whatever the cooks have prepared every day. Besides, it is all to make a healthy son.
I will stop the moment the little thing is out.
The pregnancy seem to be getting on my nerves. Lately I have been more and more irate, sometimes lashing out at the smallest thing.

I do not know what day it is, or how long is left before this pregnancy is finally over. It feels as if I have always been in this bed. I cannot recall a single accomplishment of worth in my entire life. I feel hollow, worthless, and in constant pain.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [AgedPerson] покинул[GetEndA] пост в Совете своего сюзерена, не скрывая своего гнева, и больше не хочет быть частью "этого балагана".
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! сломал[Root.GetEndA] Железную Корону Ломбардии в поисках священного гвоздя.
Эт[_от] [__персонаж] явно не испытывает недостатка в еде.
Эт[_от] [__персонаж] недоедает, что плохо сказывается на [_его] здоровье и внешнем виде.
У эт[__ого] [__персонажа] избыточный вес, что плохо сказывается на [_его] здоровье и внешнем виде.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] мне мешает. Попытаюсь задушить [From.GetHersHis] в постели.
Любой другой влиятельный епископ страны будет §Rоскорблён§! тем, что Вы предпочли ему обычного священника.

[concerned_relative.GetFirstName] grabbed the bottle out of my hand as I reached for more wine and hurled it against the wall. "You're killing yourself!", [concerned_relative.GetSheHe] shouted, tears in [concerned_relative.GetHerHis] eyes. "Stop drinking, for your family's sake."
I will try to change, for you.
You will try to stop drinking, but there is a chance you become unwell.
How dare you tell me what to do?
You make no attempt to stop drinking.

[concerned_relative.GetFirstName] passed away recently and though [concerned_relative.GetSheHe] is not around to make sure I don't drink anymore, maybe I should stop to respect [concerned_relative.GetHerHis] memory.
I will never touch another drop in their honor.
I need the drink to cope.
After hardly touching a drop of alcohol for weeks, [concerned_relative.GetFirstName] pointed out how much healthier I appear these days. "You look so much better".
I woke up today craving a drink more than anything. I feel absolutely terrible, but I won't give up. [concerned_relative.GetFirstName] would never forgive me.
This is meant to be good for me!
I tried to stop I really did, but I found a bottle that had been left out one night and drunk it all down. No one would have known if the servant hadn't told [concerned_relative.GetFirstName].
Due to my massive size I am constantly hitting my head on every door I go through, much to the amusement of anyone passing by.
I should start stooping when I go through doors.
It hurts but that just builds character.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to gather artifacts to put in their empty treasury.
To complete the ambition you need to amass three artifacts for your treasury
Have three artifacts in your treasury
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] собрал[GetEndA] поистине удивительную и прекрасную сокровищницу

I know you've been feeling down recently my court physician [physician.GetFirstName] said to me, "Try drinking this it could help, though there are some risks involved". The grey concontion smells vaguely of ash, not the most appealing prospect.
You drink the potion, despite the risk.
No way am I drinking that.
Эксклавы (не связанные территории) наследуются в обычном порядке.
Эксклавы исключаются из наследования, если не связаны со столицей по суше, морю и не являются при этом де-юре территориями.
Эксклавы исключаются из наследования, если не связаны со столицей по суше, не имеют общее море с прочими землями и не являются при этом де-юре территориями.
Эксклавы исключаются из наследования, если не связаны со столицей по морю и не являются при этом де-юре территориями.
Эксклавы исключаются из наследования, если не имеют с прочими землями общее море и не являются при этом де-юре территориями.
Эксклавы исключаются из наследования, если не имеют с прочими землями общее море.
§Y[text_target.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]§! обрёл[text_target.GetEndA] независимость от Вашего государства, ибо [text_target.GetHersHis] земли слишком далеко от Вашей столицы.

Округ §Y[text_target.Capital.GetName]§! находится слишком далеко от Вашей столицы, и теперь как[text_target.GetAyaOy]-то нагл[text_target.GetAyaYy] деревенщина по имени §Y[text_target.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]§!, захватил эти земли без боя!

Поселение §Y[text_target_barony.GetName]§! находится слишком далеко от Вашей столицы, и теперь как[text_target.GetAyaOy]-то нагл[text_target.GetAyaYy] деревенщина по имени §Y[text_target.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]§!, захватил эту землю без боя!
Ваши земли слишком далеко от столицы Вашего сюзерена, и теперь Вы потеряли с ними контакт, став де-факто независим[Root.GetOyYm].
Эт[_от] [__персонаж] имеет слишком большое тело, что вызывает проблемы со здоровьем и часто приводит к смерти в юном возрасте.
My giant body has given me troubles since I was born, and now I have grown to the point where I can barely walk without assistance. I am lucky to still have the strength to lift my own head...
No - from now on I will work out every day!
Why is [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] playing this cruel trick on me?

Since I was a mere child my body has been growing and growing, and with its growth I have constantly trained it. I now stand an imposing figure, not only tall like a mountain - but also with muscles like a [Root.GetRegionalFerociousAnimalACC]!
How is the weather down there?
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] страдает от проблем со здоровьем, вызванных [GetHersHis] гигантизмом, несмотря на то, что толстая кожа и специфический голос дают [GetHerHim] преимущество в бою.

As I get older and older my body will just not stop its incessant growth! My skin is getting thicker, my voice is becoming deeper, my limbs hurt and I have a headache that just will not go away. While my immense stature is more imposing than ever, I feel my spirit slowly leaving my body...
How long am I for this world?

Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] очень серьёзно относится к физическим нагрузкам во время беременности, стараясь избегать их и делать перерывы между делами в любой момент.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] старается поменьше думать о своём состоянии во время беременности и отвлечь себя любым способом.
Заботясь о здоровье своего будушего ребёнка, эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] даёт себе больше времени для отдыха во время повседневных дел.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] верит в знаки о том, что [GetHersHis] беременность закончится благополучно как для н[GetHersHis], так и для ребёнка.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] верит в знаки о том, что [GetHersHis] беременность закончится плохо.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] дал[GetEndA] клятву о том, что будет сдерживать зов плоти, а взамен надеется, что Богородица защитит [GetHersHis] и [GetHersHis] дитя во время родов.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] дал[GetEndA] клятву о том, что будет вести себя скромно, а взамен надеется, что Богородица защитит [GetHersHis] и [GetHersHis] дитя во время родов.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] дал[GetEndA] клятву о том, что позаботится о бедных и больных, а взамен надеется, что Богородица защитит [GetHersHis] и [GetHersHis] дитя во время родов.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] дал[GetEndA] клятву о том, что будет сдерживать себя от излишеств, а взамен надеется, что Богородица защитит [GetHersHis] и [GetHersHis] дитя во время родов.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] отправи[GetLasLsya] од[GetNaIn] в дикие места, чтобы открыть себя и своего будущего ребёнка плохой погоде, хищникам и бандитам.
Визит любимого человека помог это[GetYMu] [GetAgedPersonDAT] успокоить свой разум во время трудного периода беременности.
This is going to be my first child, and I feel completely lost. What if I am doing something wrong? What if something bad happens? What should I do while I wait for the day of my labor?
I need to pray for my child's good health.
I need to rest and avoid any hard task.
I need to find something to distract myself from this burden.
Ouch! As I place a hand over my belly and slowly sit down, a soft smile makes its way across my face. The baby is kicking again. I wonder if he will grow up to be a warrior...
I am sure I am carrying a fierce little soldier.
Буйный нрав ребёнка в Вашем животе может быть признаком его будушего характера.

Today, as I was laying down, gently caressing my stomach and looking out my bedroom's window, I started to wonder what will my next child be. It would be nice to finally give birth to a boy, after all this time, and make sure my dynasty has a proper heir...

Today, as I was laying down, gently caressing my stomach and looking out my bedroom's window, I started to wonder what will my next child be. It would be nice to finally give birth to a girl, after all this time, and make sure my dynasty has a proper heir...
Today, as I was laying down, gently caressing my stomach and looking out my bedroom's window, I started to wonder what will my next child be: am I carrying a boy or a girl?
I sure hope it is a boy.
Вы будете очень рады, если этот ребёнок окажется §Yмальчиком§!.
I sure hope it is a girl.
Вы будете очень рады, если этот ребёнок окажется §Yдевочкой§!.

What a bother! The number of good dresses that I am still able to wear is growing increasingly smaller as my pregnancy takes its course. Perhaps I should order new clothes to be tailored on my current measurements...
Maybe if I ate less I could still wear some of my old dresses...
I will have [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] buy me new clothes.
I really need to order new clothes.
No need to go through all this trouble for some dress.

My wife [From.GetFirstName] asked me to buy her some new clothes. Because of the pregnancy, she has outgrown most of her wardrobe and now she feels frustrated for not having anything nice to wear whenever she needs to make an appearance at court.
My dear, you do not need new clothes. You are already wonderful!
Why? So that she can throw them away a few months from now?
[From.GetFirstName] convinced me that I do not need any new fancy clothes when I am already positively glowing.
[From.GetFirstName] was happy to buy me new clothes. Being able to wear something that is both nice and comfortable has certainly improved my disposition.
Unbelievable! [From.GetFirstName] refused to buy me new clothes! Am I not already under enough stress as it is?
He never thinks about how I feel.
At first the signs were small, easily dismissed as coincidences, but now they are becoming too frequent to be ignored: I will give birth under auspicious stars.
I must be sure to interpret all signs correctly.
At first the signs were small, easily dismissed as coincidences, but now they are becoming too frequent to be ignored: my wife will give birth under auspicious stars.
At first the signs were small, easily dismissed as coincidences, but now they are becoming too frequent to be ignored: the omens surrounding my pregnancy are terrible.
Maybe I am misinterpreting the signs...
At first the signs were small, easily dismissed as coincidences, but now they are becoming too frequent to be ignored: the omens surrounding my wife's pregnancy are terrible.
I am sure I am misinterpreting the signs.
My poor [From.GetFirstName]! What am I going to do now!?!

I am uncertain about my future and I cannot stop worrying about the life of my unborn child. Perhaps I should make a vow to the Holy Virgin Mary, and pray her to ease my tribulations and help me give birth to a strong and healthy child.
Решить, какую клятву Богородице Вы хотите дать.
I do not need to concern the Holy Virgin with my troubles.
The statue of the Holy Virgin stands over the chapel's alcove, the divine child resting on her arm. I kneel before it and look up at her somber smile.
I vow to be chaste and virtuous.
Будьте §Yцеломудренн[Root.GetOyYm]§!, избегайте плотских удовольствий и тогда §YПресвятая Дева§! благословит Вас сильным и здоровым ребёнком.
I vow to be humble and set aside all frivolous things.
Будьте §Yсмиренн[Root.GetOyYm]§!, не носите богатую одежду и дорогие украшения и тогда §YПресвятая Дева§! благословит Вас сильным и здоровым ребёнком.
I vow to be charitable and take care of the needy.
Будьте §Yщедр[Root.GetOyYm]§!, помогайте бедным и больным и тогда §YПресвятая Дева§! благословит Вас сильным и здоровым ребёнком.
I vow to be temperate and avoid all excesses.
Будьте §Yумеренн[Root.GetOyYm]§!, избегайте излишеств и тогда §YПресвятая Дева§! благословит Вас сильным и здоровым ребёнком.

I cannot stop worrying about my unborn child. Perhaps I should make a personal offering to the old gods and placate their thirst for blood so that they in turn may spare the life of my unborn child as well as mine.
I will make an offering to the gods.
Откройтесь опасностям дикой природы, чтобы дать богам право решить судьбу Вашего нерождённого ребёнка.
It would be too dangerous to go out alone in my condition.

As the smoke of my offering rises to the sky, I can almost hear the faint whispers of the gods traveling through the wind. I have called the attention of the immortals, it is now time to make my request.
Gods! Grant me a strong and healthy child!
Если боги пожелают, Ваш ребёнок родится §Yсильным§!.
Gods! I only hope to have a beautiful and healthy child!
Если боги пожелают, Ваш ребёнок родится §Yпривлекательным§!.
Gods! I wish for my child to be bright and healthy!
Если боги пожелают, Ваш ребёнок родится §Yумным§!.
Ugh, the child is in the mood for something different today. What should I eat?
It does not matter 'what' as long as it is a LOT.
Похоже, Вы не жаждете чего-то необычного. Это хорошо.
I wonder what a quail's foot tastes like...
Приказать приготовить Вам §Yперепелиную лапку§! на ужин.
I am really feeling hungry for hare's head...
Приказать приготовить Вам §Yголову кролика§! на ужин.
I want a trout's eye! NOW!
Приказать приготовить Вам §Yглаз форели§! на ужин.
I will ask my husband about it.

The pregnancy has caused my wife to develop quite the unusual tastes. Most of what she asks for dinner nowadays ranges from mildly unsettling to positively revolting. Still, scholars do agree that a pregnant woman's cravings should always be accommodated...
I will make sure that she gets all she wants and more.
Are you sure you do not mean a quail's *leg*, dear?
Приказать Вашим поварам приготовить §Yперепелиную лапку§! для Ваше[From.GetYGo] [From.GetRootRelationGEN].
Приказать Вашим поварам приготовить §Yголову кролика§! для Ваше[From.GetYGo] [From.GetRootRelationGEN].
