I am excited to finally be on my way, to find my destiny as I search for the final burial place of  [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick].

I come across another group of pilgrims, also traveling to [pilgrimage_destination.GetName], to ask for the blessing of  [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick]. Traveling together could be beneficial and safer, though probably somewhat slower.
I come across another group of pilgrims, also traveling to Rath Celtair, to ask for the blessing of Saint Patrick. Traveling together could be beneficial, and safer, though probably somewhat slower.
I come across another group of pilgrims, also traveling to ask for the blessing of Saint Augustine. Traveling together could be beneficial, and safer, though probably somewhat slower.
I come across another group of pilgrims, also traveling to Antioch, to ask for the blessing of Saint Christopher. Traveling together could be beneficial, and safer, though probably somewhat slower.
Friendly company? That sounds like a nice change of pace.

I am suddenly met by a couple of rough looking fellows, as I proceed through the woods. The leader gives me a toothy grin and asks for protection money, for the service he and his men are doing in the woods.
It is probably easier to just pay.
I will show them who needs protection.

It is getting progressively colder, as I am getting closer to my destination. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to [pilgrimage_destination.GetName] by now. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.

It is getting progressively colder, as I am getting closer to my destination. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to Rath Celtair by now. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.
I wonder what awaits me in [pilgrimage_destination.GetName].
I wonder what awaits me in Rath Celtair.

The days have been long, but nice and temperate. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to [pilgrimage_destination.GetName] by now. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.
The days have been long, but nice and temperate. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to Antioch. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.
I wonder what awaits me in [pilgrimage_destination.GetName].
I wonder what awaits me in Antioch.

There have been new sights to behold every day, as I travel to [pilgrimage_destination.Realm.GetName]. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to [pilgrimage_destination.GetName] by now. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.

There have been new sights to behold every day, as I travel to Africa. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to Hippo. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.
I wonder what awaits me in [pilgrimage_destination.GetName].
I wonder what awaits me in Hippo.

It has been a tiresome yet fulfilling journey so far, as I travel to [pilgrimage_destination.Realm.GetName]. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to [pilgrimage_destination.GetName] by now. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.
I wonder what awaits me in [pilgrimage_destination.GetName].

I come across a group of caravans, filled with the laughter and joy of a group of traveling entertainers. As day turns to night, I enjoy the company of the group. A particularly beautiful [Root.GetManWomanOpp] is teasing me, and invites me to stay the night.

I come across a group of caravans, filled with the laughter and joy of a group of traveling entertainers. As day turns to night, I enjoy the company of the group. A particularly beautiful [Root.GetManWoman] is teasing me, and invites me to stay the night.
That sounds like a nice suggestion.
What kind of [Root.GetManWoman] do you think I am?

It has been a long day of traveling, when I come across a burning inn. I had hoped to find a place to stay the night, but these people are clearly in dire need of help just stopping the flames from engulfing the entire place.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] calls upon me to help out these poor people.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] calls upon me to continue my pilgrimage.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] calls upon me to grab some valuables while they are busy.
A loud roar, and suddenly there is a huge furry creature just down the road. A bear? Now? Here? This must be a creature sent by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] to test me and my faith.

I feel like I have been walking in circles for the last hours, and I am sure I have seen these trees before. If I continue walking in circles, I will never get out of here. A plan would be nice, but what kind of options do I have?
I will cut my path out of here, one tree at a time if I have to!
I just need to be patient, and slowly find my way out of here.
Oh, it is that way, clearly.

The rain is pouring down and I am desperately looking for a shelter, when I come across an old church. A priest welcomes me inside, gives me some warm clothes and a hot meal. When he mentions that it probably will not stop raining for a couple of days, I wonder if I have time to wait for that long.
It is better to rest a couple of days.
A real pilgrim would not let weather stop them.
I wake up with a sudden, to the hissing of a snake right next to me. This creature of the [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] must have been sent to test my faith.
I will vanquish this evil foe!
I will just get away from this cursed place.
Maybe I should hold onto this little one, just in case?

According to all maps I have seen, there should just be wilderness here. And yet here I am standing in the middle of an empty town square. I occasionally see people through the windows, looking skeptically at me. I walk down to the town chapel, hoping to find a sensible soul there.

I open the door, and there is a huge bloody altar and dark clad people filling the room. They all turn towards me, pulling out their daggers and knives as the high priest suddenly starts talking. He bids me welcome, as I am the one who apparently will bring forth an old one.
What is this talk of old ones?
Blasphemers, I will cut you down!

The dark priest explains the ritual, which includes all of us being burnt down with the unholy church. After the church has burnt down, we will all be reborn with the old one and destroy the world as it exists right now, and reshape it in our image.
I will go along with the ritual.
This is crazy! I would rather fight my way out of here than go along with this!

I wake up, all alone in the middle of a field. I do not know what have happened with the villagers and the cultists, nor where they have gone. The last thing I remember, was the church burning down with us inside it.
I.. guess I will continue my pilgrimage?

All of a sudden, I find myself in [pilgrimage_destination.GetName] before I know it. It has been a long journey through the wilds, to once more see people is a nice change. As I walk through the city streets, I compare it to my homeland, and how the people have dealt with the cold and ice in these lands. I should find my way to the burial site of [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetName] as quickly as possible, that is what I am here for after all.

All of a sudden, I find myself in Rath Celtair before I know it. It has been a long journey through the wilds, to once more see people is a nice change. As I walk through the city streets, I compare it to my homeland, how the people have dealt with the cold and ice in these lands. I should find my way to the burial site of Saint Patrick as quickly as possible, that is what I am here for after all.
I wonder what the grave will look like.

The whole area is filled with people, looking like they come from all the different corners of the world. I see another [Root.GetCultureAdj] looking at me, and giving me a small nod before [Root.GetSheHeOpp] disappears in the crowd. I never knew  [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick] was this popular or well known. Though it is stressful, I finally get my moment to stand in front of the grave, and feel the blessed aura of the Saint.

There is a couple of other pilgrims around, but they all look relatively local to the area. I walk over to the grave, and look down at the small statue of the saint as well as the stone commemorating the life of the saint. It has been a long journey to get to [pilgrimage_destination.GetName], and I finally get to look upon the blessed burial site of  [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick].

The burial site is completely void of people, not a single soul to be seen. I look around for it, almost sure I am at the wrong place for a moment, and then I see the small grave. It looks overgrown and deserted, and I take some time to tidy the place up before I finally sit down in prayer to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. It is almost like  [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick] is here and prays with me.

The whole area is empty besides a nun cleaning a corner of the small chapel. She approaches me, and asks if I am here to see the grave of Saint Patrick. I give here a small nod, before she brings me to the large rock where he presumably lie. She kneels down next to me, and we take a moment to pray to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] together. And then I am left alone with the grave.
I will remember this moment for the rest of my life.
Was.. Was this it? What a disappointing end.
What a journey it has been.

The burial site of Saint Christopher is a large one in the middle of a square in Antioch, and few of the local populace seem to care much. I can see a couple of other pilgrims like myself, standing around the grave, looking somewhat flustered, yet happy. I can relate to them, as my journey finally reached its conclusion here in Syria. I take a long time to pray before the grave site.
I will remember this moment for the rest of my life.

[Root.GetMonkOrder] доставил Вам послание. Your ancestor made an impact on them, and they would like to extend their hand to you in friendship. If you so wish, they will settle some of their monks in [Root.Capital.GetName] to talk to the locals and spread the faithful message of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
A donation to help them out will be made.

All right, I wish them luck.

Years have passed with great fortunes and trading across the Baltic Sea, and the great [Root.GetCultureAdj] cities in Holstein and Mecklenburg have grown into wealth and expanded considerably.

[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] have given us the right of becoming Free Imperial Cities of the Empire. With my seat at [Root.Capital.GetName], I have become the new Mayor of the Hanseatic League, a large Merchant Republic that will span the entire Northern Seas.

With [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] at our back, we will grow to become a major player in the Empire. The petty feudal princes of old will bow down before us.
We have a bright future ahead of us.

Several German merchant guilds and trade cities along the shores of northern Europe have come together in Lьbeck to form the Hanseatic League with the blessing of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] of [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. This loose confederation of Free Imperial Cities is dedicated towards the continued prosperity of its members and the mutual defense of any merchant vassals flying its flag. Their eventual and unstated goal, of course, is to one day completely dominate all trade along the Baltic and North Seas...
That is bound to ruffle some feathers...

For a long time, the cities around the central Alps have been threatened by other actors inside the Empire. All our cities have the honor of imperial immediacy, and we have agreed to come together to defend one another. No longer will we stand alone in the face of these threats, but rather we will stand together as a stronger faction.\n\nI have been chosen as the head of this confederation, as the one who will be the figurehead of all the Cantons of our new Swiss Confederation. No longer will we be threatened by outsiders, but rather be a strong independent actor in the Empire.
We will be safer as a unified group.

A new entity known as the Swiss Confederation has risen in the Empire. They are a conglomeration of cities with imperial immediacy settled around the central Alps, and they have entered a defensive alliance to protect themselves from the other electors around them.

An independent force to be reckoned with, they have broken free from any prior claims to their lands, be it from the old Burgundians to the west or the German lords to the north

I should look out for this new potential threat in the Empire.
Соберите все земли Центрального плато в новую объединённую Швейцарскую Конфедерацию.

But is it worth the risk?

My [Root.GetLordLady], we do not have a lot of time. Should we be careful and take it slow, or hurry and grab as much as possible? My captain asks me, as we breach the tomb of Saint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName].

My men suddenly bring drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] into my room. "My [Root.GetLordLady], we found this [From.GetManWoman] in the tomb of Saint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName], clearly trying to pillage the place."

The burial site of §YSaint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName]§! at [target_burial_site.GetName] has been plundered, and has been left a complete mess...

My men has come across the burial site of some sort of holy person for the pathetic [pillaged_christian.Religion.GetGroupName] [pillaged_christian.GetTitledFirstName]. This could be a chance to show them how we treat their weak holy people.

I received a letter and a package from [From.GetTitledFirstName], where [From.GetSheHe] recommends me to take a look through the books [From.GetSheHe] sent me. They seem to be mostly focused around politics and negotiations.

I have noted a difference in the day to day political life recently, as I have started to find it a lot easier to simply converse with my courtiers and political allies.
My men look sharper and more ready for war than ever, and I feel ready to lead them to war. I would not have expected anything akin to this, just a couple of weeks ago.
Money has been flowing the last month as every business deal I do seem to go in my favor, and my people seem happier than ever.
Whatever rumors might have been floating around, seem to have dissipated the last month, and my own rumormongers have effectively spread a better image of me.
I found myself reading some of the more obscure, older books from the library. I have always been somewhat skeptical of these books, but they are not actually that bad after all.
My hard work is paying off.
I certainly worked hard for my recent accomplishments, but a lot of people have been saying it is because of [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] help.

My men look at me with scornful eyes. Whatever [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] wanted to help me with, this is clearly not having a positive effect on the men.

I keep hearing more distasteful rumors spread about me by the day. If [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] wanted to help out, this is clearly not having the effect we wanted.
I start questioning my writing, and I have lost all interest in reading. I know [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] probably wanted to help, but it is having an adverse effect.
A lot of people has blamed me for the recent chaos that has been happening around the court, but was it not [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] who originally wanted to help out?

This child is not worth my life!
Выпить §Yнастойку можжевельника§!, чтобы избавиться от нерождённого ребёнка.
As if being infidel to me was not enough, I have just discovered that, rather than risk her life in a difficult pregnancy, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to kill the child growing in her womb.
I have just discovered something terrible! Rather than risk her life in a difficult pregnancy, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to kill the child growing in her womb.
Not my child, not my problem.
Everyone should know about her crime!
I must find the strength to forgive her.
I suppose we will have to try again...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] somehow found out that my abortion was not an accident. Even worse, [From.GetSheHe] made the news public, accusing me of infanticide.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] somehow discovered that my abortion was not an accident. Fortunately, [From.GetSheHe] told me that [From.GetSheHe] understands why I took this decision and that [From.GetSheHe] is still willing to stand by me and support my choice.
I am so glad of it!

В этом месте верующие организовали небольшую тайную общину. Здесь они принимают новых последователей и оберегают своих сторонников.

§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has passed away. I can only hope [From.GetSheHe] remembered me fondly in [From.GetHerHis] last moments...
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has passed away. I guess I will have to find another plaything to torment now.
Despite now being [From.GetHerHis] opponent in war, I still feel as if I can try reaching out to [From.GetTitledFirstName] in some way...
If we fight, let us fight honorably.

Can we not put an end to this unnecessary conflict?
Предложить, чтобы §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! встрети[From.GetLasLsya] с Вами и Вы могли бы вместе обсудить причины конфликта.
I honor the bravery of your troops.
Отправить письмо, которое получит §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. В этом письме положительно отозваться о доблести и навыках [From.GetHersHis] солдат.

Despite the war we are waging against each other, [From.GetTitledFirstName] still hopes that the two of us can remain on good terms. [From.GetSheHeCap] has petitioned me to reach an agreement to never use underhanded tactics against each other whenever our armies meet on the field of battle.

Despite the war we are waging against each other, [From.GetTitledFirstName] still hopes that the two of us can find a peaceful and harmless resolution to this conflict. [From.GetSheHeCap] has assured me that [From.GetSheHe] is ready to order [From.GetHerHis] armies to stand down if I promise to do the same.

Despite the war we are waging against each other, [From.GetTitledFirstName] still hopes that the two of us can remain on good terms. [From.GetSheHeCap] has invited me to a short meeting under the white flag, hoping to find some common ground despite the ongoing hostilities.

Despite the war we are waging against each other, [From.GetTitledFirstName] still hopes that the two of us can remain on good terms. I have just received a letter from [From.GetHerHim], complimenting me and my troops for the valor and skills we have shown during the war.
Приказать своим войскам отказаться от тактики §Yзасад§! против армии, которую ведёт §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! досто[From.GetYnaIn] доверия. Встретиться с н[From.GetEyIm] под белым флагом.
Your troops proved to be just as brave.
If only I could say the same about yours...
I was happy to hear [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I are of one mind on this issue. We will both refrain from using underhanded tactics against each other during this war.
The messenger came in this morning to inform me that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to accept my offer of peace. The war is over.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to trust me and accept my offer and meet me during a momentary truce. While it is unlikely that this meeting will result in a settlement of our dispute, it might help us to maintain a healthy relationship in spite of the war.
This is the perfect opportunity to capture [From.GetHerHim]!
I will make my reasons clear.
Unfortunately, it appears that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is not interested in limiting [From.GetHerHis] option when fighting against my troops, probably not trusting that I would do the same.
Unfortunately, it appears that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is not interested in talks of peace right now.
Unfortunately, it appears that [From.GetTitledFirstName] does not trust me enough yet to meet me in person.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was flattered by the honors I bestowed upon [From.GetHerHis] troops and was happy to reciprocate them.

Sadly, [From.GetTitledFirstName] ignored my flattering message regarding the bravery of [From.GetHerHis] troops and the skill of [From.GetHerHis] commanders in battle. Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] did not believe me to be truthful...

I have been betrayed! [From.GetTitledFirstName] took advantage of my trust to ambush me during our meeting, breaking the truce that [From.GetSheHe] [From.GetHerselfHimself] had called. I am now at [From.GetHerHis] mercy!

My plan worked brilliantly! I have caught [From.GetFirstName] during our brief meeting. While breaking the truce has considerably hurt my reputation, this trickery could bring a quick resolution to this war.

I was not wrong to trust [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The truce allowed us to discuss many things and clarify our respective reasons to fight this war against each other. Even though we were unable to reach a peaceful resolution, I think that we have come to respect each other quite a bit more after this meeting.

Thankfully, the truce I called for allowed me and [From.GetTitledFirstName] to discuss many things and clarify our respective reasons to fight this war against each other. Even though we were unable to reach a peaceful resolution, I think that we have come to respect each other quite a bit more after this meeting.
You cannot §YSway§! and §YAntagonize§! the same character at the same time.
Only through human flesh the truth can be revealed!

[Root.GetHaruspexName] cuts the prisoner open. While the man's heart is immolated, the diviner starts rummaging through his entrails. The response is quite clear. The gods favor our cause in the war to come! The troops will fight with renewed strength now that they know for sure that our victory has been ordained from the heavens.

[Root.GetHaruspexName] cuts the prisoner open. While the man's heart is immolated, the diviner starts rummaging through his entrails. The signs are not entirely clear, but the diviner assures me that there was no signs of the Fates opposing our war. Our troops will surely be comforted by knowing that the gods are not against them.

[Root.GetHaruspexName] cuts the prisoner open. While the man's heart is immolated, the diviner starts rummaging through his entrails. Unfortunately, the response from the diviner is not as positive as I hoped. There are clear signs that the gods are not in favor of this war. This news will not be good for morale...

[Root.GetHaruspexName] cuts the prisoner open. While the man's heart is immolated, the diviner starts rummaging through his entrails. The response is terrible. Not only are the gods against us in this war but, according to the signs interpreted by the diviner, they seem to be favoring our enemies!

I was told many time when I was growing up of how the stars are influencing my behavior, but now I am no longer sure of it. Was it just stories grown-ups were telling me to make me feel special?
I don't care about the stupid stars!
My [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has taken a deep interest in the circumstances of [From.GetHerHis] birth and in the constellations affecting [From.GetHerHis] destiny.
My [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetFirstName] seems to be unwilling to take into consideration the circumstances of [From.GetHerHis] birth and the constellations affecting [From.GetHerHis] destiny.

I should not let the stars rule over me!
My [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetFirstName] praised me today for paying the due respect to the heavens and taking a healthy interest in astrology and the influence that the stars have on me.

I must look up to see what is inside me.

Потратить некоторое время на изучение руин и документов древних греков и римлян.
Потратить некоторое время на изучение руин и документов древних греков и римлян.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] долго изучал[GetEndA] тексты с описанием военных хитростей Юлия Цезаря, чтобы отточить свои военные навыки.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] долго изучал[GetEndA] речи Цицерона и других известных политиков классической эпохи, чтобы отточить навыки дипломатии и познакомиться с искусством софистики.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] долго изучал[GetEndA] отчёты и труды императора Юстиниана, чтобы улучшить своё понимание государственного управления и римского права.

I walk amongst the ruins of one of the greatest civilizations to ever grace this world. I should take the opportunity to study in detail the history and the glorious accomplishments of those that came before us if I ever wish to emulate their feats.
I wish to know more about these strange gods they worshiped...
I want to study the great generals of old and their tactics.
I wonder how the old Empire worked...
I wish to study the speeches of the great men of ancient times.

I did my best, but my attempts to study the history of the Roman Empire were not as successful as I hoped. Most accounts I was able to access are fragmented and confusing. I don't think I was able to learn anything valuable after all these months of study.

I am fascinated by the legends of the old gods worshiped by Romans and Greeks in the past. Their capricious and passionate nature differs so much from [catholic.GetHighGodName]'s unknowable and contradictory designs... Their plots and rivalries certainly offer a better explanation for the chaotic state of our world.
What if *they* are the real gods?
They are nothing but entertaining stories.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of Caesar's military exploits against the Gauls. It has been an enlightening learning experience and I am sure that, despite the difference in equipment and sizes, I can apply some of his tactics against my own enemies.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of some of Rome's greatest statesmen. Reading the works of Emperor Justinian and of his reformation of the Roman legal code in particular has been an eye-opening experience for me.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of some of Rome's finest orators. Reading through the treaties of Cicero and other great sophists has allowed me to learn a lot about the fine art of diplomacy and politics.

Последователи религии бон поклоняются многим богам и духам. Приверженцы стремятся к "великому совершенству" через дзогчен, который является одним из девяти путей их веры. В тайне они приносят в жертву фигуры животных, сделанные из ячменного теста дабы почтить высшие силы.

Последователи эллинизма почитают старых богов Древней Греции и Рима. Они приносят в жертву животных и предсказывают свою судьбу при помощи астрологии, будучи убеждёнными в том, что их божества, подверженные своим собственным слабостям и страстям, чаще всего проявляют безразличие к поступкам смертных.

Последователи эллинизма почитают старых богов Древней Греции и Рима. Они приносят в жертву животных и предсказывают свою судьбу при помощи астрологии, будучи убеждёнными в том, что их божества, подверженные своим собственным слабостям и страстям, чаще всего проявляют безразличие к поступкам смертных.
Эт[GetEtaEtot] [GetAgedPerson] восстанавливается после травмирующих обстоятельств, сопутствующих избавлению [GetHersHis] от собственного нерождённого ребёнка.

What horrible crime have I committed? Whenever I close my eyes I can hear the silent cries of my son that never was. The guilt for the ruthless murder of that innocent soul plagues my mind like a disease.

The unthinkable has happened. Rumors about my terrible crime have spread across the court. And, if the stories are true, I have nobody to blame but myself. The servant whisper that every night I walk in my sleep around the castle, asking forgiveness to the child I murdered before his own birth.
I feel that there is something wrong with me. The premature end to my last pregnancy broke something within me.
Граждане Рима восстали после безжалостного разрушения, нанесенного их новым Императором.
Убедитесь, что §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! недавно НЕ выбирал[Root.GetEndA] религиозное направление.
Решение восстановить мёртвый языческий культ вместо поклонения авраамическому богу расстроило многих вассалов по всей империи.
Решение восстановить мёртвый языческий культ вместо поклонения авраамическому богу втянуло недавно реформированную империю в гражданскую войну.

For centuries the Church has had free reign to lord over Rome, the ancient capital of my Empire. The influence of the Papacy looms still over the city, as its many churches can attest. Perhaps it is time to reaffirm the authority of the Empire over the Church in incontrovertible terms...

Even now that the Christians have been driven out of the great and ancient city of Rome, the monuments to their God still persist, challenging my authority as [Root.GetTitle]. I have only one option if I wish to truly claim Rome for myself...

Centuries ago, the Galileans, in order to hide their crimes, falsely accused one of my predecessors of burning Rome to the ground. Perhaps it is time I returned them the favor and cleansed the Empire's old capital of the wretched temples scourging its Seven Hills...
I must rid the city of any lingering Christian influence.
Heathens as they are, we should not destroy their temples.
We must endeavor to be better than them.

In order to stamp out any remaining rebellious aspirations and punish past insults against the Empire, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the destruction of the Holy See itself. After having priests and prelates abandon their churches in a hurry, barely giving them enough time to recover relics and books, [From.GetCultureAdj] soldiers consigned the holy buildings to the flames.\nThis abominable act is certain to permanently cripple the authority of the Catholic Church for centuries to come.

In a flagrant act of disrespect and carelessness for tradition and culture, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the destruction of the Holy See itself. After having priests and prelates abandon their churches in a hurry, barely giving them enough time to recover relics and books, [From.GetCultureAdj] soldiers consigned the holy buildings to the flames.\nThis abominable act is certain to permanently cripple the authority of the Catholic Church for centuries to come.

Living up the reputation of the heathen Emperors of old, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the ruthless destruction of the Holy See itself, in an attempt to undermine Christendom. After forcefully locking priests and cardinals within their own churches, [From.GetCultureAdj] soldiers consigned the holy buildings to the flames.\nThis abominable act is certain to permanently cripple the authority of the Catholic Church for centuries to come.
The wailing of Christians does not concern me.
Galileans will be the ones to burn for a change...
§Y[GetChristianGroupAdjCap]ский§! мир возмущён Вашими действиями.\nУничтожение §YСвятого Престола§! сильно повлияет на §Yморальный авторитет§! §Y[католиче]ской церкви§!.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is forever damned by this act!
The burning of Christian temples is of no concern to us.
It is time somebody rectified the failings of our ancestors...

The citizens of Rome have not reacted well to the city's great fire. After boiling for a few days, a large mob of peasants has broken the peace and assaulted the local garrison, rebelling openly against the destruction of the Holy See and the collateral damage caused by the fire to the people's homes.

I have restored the Empire, a feat worthy of immortal glory, yet now doubts beset my mind. How can I ensure that this Empire will not fall like it did in the past? When looking for the causes that fragmented and destroyed the old Empire, there is only one thing that appears to be constant...
Christianity led us to our fall...
Рабать над возрождением древнего §Y[эллин]изма§!, в надежде, что укрепит Империю.
Weak and impious leaders doomed us.

Could it be possible that, by embracing the barbaric Eastern religion of Christ, Emperor Theodosius weakened the Empire, and that, conversely, I might be able to strengthen it by reintroducing the worship of the old gods? My decision could just as easily doom the Empire a second time as I attempt to save it...
I must act quickly, when people still praise me for restoring the Empire!

Разослать письма всем Вашим §Yвассалам§! с приказом последовать Вашему примеру и принять §Y[эллин]изм§!.\nВсе §Y[эллин]ские§! священные места перейдут под Ваш контроль. Вы сможете построить в них новые храмы.
I must act patiently and find kindred souls before revealing my plans.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
We have come to the conclusion that Our predecessors' attachment to the barbaric cult of the Galileans is inextricably tied to the fall of this great Empire of ours, and I have come to the resolution that, in order to truly restore the glory of Rome, we must also restore its ancient religion.

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I must bow to the Imperial will.

I shall not be part of this farce. I am a §Y[From.Religion.GetName]§!, and I will not abandon my faith in [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

I am happy to stand right beside you for the resurgence of the §YHellenic§! faith, my [Root.GetTitle].

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I have come to the conclusion to abide by the new Imperial decree and convert to the Hellenic faith. I expect all my subordinates to follow me in this decision.

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I will not convert to a dead religion!

The great celebrations across the Christian world after the restoration of the Roman Empire at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] have been cut short by a terrifying and unexpected turn of events. The new [From.GetTitle] has determined that Christianity is a barbarous and seditious cult that has no place in [From.GetHerHis] new Empire. \nIn an effort to rebuild the past glory of Rome in its entirety, [From.GetSheHe] has forsaken [From.GetHerHis] faith in favor of worshiping the old pagan gods of [From.GetHerHis] ancestors.
The old gods will rise from the ashes of the Church!
We stand united against the barbarity of the Galileans!
Babylon has risen again! The end time is near!
This is of no concern to us.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has clearly gone insane, yet, with the authority [From.GetSheHe] has accumulated after [From.GetHerHis] many accomplishments, [From.GetSheHe] might be able of perverting the Empire into a force for evil, a nation of idolaters. [From.GetSheHeCap] must be stopped now, before it's too late!
We must rise up and depose this tyrant!
Разослать письма всем последователям §YЕдиного Истинного Бога§! в Империи с призывом объединиться, чтобы свергнуть апостата с трона.
There is nothing we can do.

To all the faithful of the One True God!\nThe [From.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] has taken over our [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle]'s mind, twisting it with lies and madness. We must stand together and depose the Apostate who sits on the holy throne of Rome or see the accursed heathens spread once again across our world.\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
These are the words of a traitor.

The time has come!\nAll the followers of the One True God suffering under the yoke of our mad [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle] have reunited under my lead and are ready to bring the blasphemous tyrant to justice.

Several indignant vassals have banded together to stand against the new Imperial religion of Rome. They have taken arms and plan to overthrow their own [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle] and restore the worship of their god throughout the Empire.
I cannot say I am surprised...

Despite the incredible unpopularity of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] decision, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to emerge victorious from the Empire's recent civil war and reaffirm [FromFrom.GetHerHis] desire to restore the Hellenic faith to the Roman world. After [FromFrom.GetHerHis] show of force and lucidity, the Emperor has gained several new supporters, both amongst the people as well as the nobility. \n\nThis is truly a new beginning for Rome and a dark day for Christians everywhere.

The Civil War has ended, and [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] has reaffirmed [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] authority as our rightful [FromFromFrom.GetTitle]. Perhaps it is time I reconsidered my choice and embraced Hellenism, lest I suffer the [FromFromFrom.GetTitle]'s wrath.
Deep down I always believed in [hellenic_pagan.GetHighGodName]!
No, I must stand my ground!
Принять §Y[эллин]изм§! и потребовать от §Yвассалов§! сделать то же самое.
Восстановив Империю, мы снова сможем наслаждаться цивилизованным и богатым образом жизни наших предков.
По всей Империи начнёт распространяться §Y[_рим]ская культура§!.
Восстановив Империю, мы снова сможем наслаждаться цивилизованным и богатым образом жизни наших предков.

As expected, the reintroduction of ancient Roman law and customs has not been well received by the Galilean moralizers. An entire coalition of Christian priests has petitioned me to put a stop to these new excesses to prevent the damnation of my subjects' souls.

The higher standards of living that many of my subjects have had access to since the restoration of the Empire have caused the ire of a few moralizers amongst my Christian subjects. A group of petitioners from the Church's clergy has pleaded me to put a stop to these new, luxurious customs, as they are detrimental to my people's salvation.

The higher standards of living that many of my subjects have had access to since the restoration of the Empire appear to have caused the anger of some Christian priests. A group of petitioners from the Church's clergy has pleaded me to put a stop to these new, luxurious customs, as they are detrimental to my people's salvation.
Your cult of mediocrity is no longer law.
I care not for the lamentations of infidels.
On the contrary, I must be charitable to be virtuous!
Объявить великий период празднования по всей Империи, ещё больше поощряя принятие §Y[_рим]ской культуры§!.
We will endeavor to be moderate.
It is not our intention to upset the Christians.
Far from me to eschew humility...
Исход гражданской войны вынудит ещё больше граждан Империи принять §Y[эллин]изм§!.

The newborn [leader_of_myrmidons.Religion.GetName] religion has found new protectors in the Myrmidons, a company of faithful warriors dedicated to the protection of the sacred altars of the old gods and the fight against the barbarous infidels besieging them.\n They swear loyalty to all [leader_of_myrmidons.Religion.GetName] rulers against those who would do them harm. A most devout [leader_of_myrmidons.GetManWoman], named [leader_of_myrmidons.GetFirstName], has pledged [leader_of_myrmidons.GetHerselfHimself] to undertake the leadership of the order to preserve their way of life.
Мы можем призвать великих воинов под свои знамёна, дабы они защищали нас от варваров-иноверцев.

Тайный культ Бахуса всегда был чумой для цивилизованного общества Древнего Рима. Члены этого культа собираются по ночам, чтобы совершать непристойные ритуалы для удовлетворения своих первичных инстинктов, занимаясь колдовством, каннибализмом и скотоложеством.
Убедитесь, что эт[Root.GetEtaEtot] [Root.GetAgedPerson] НЕ привлека[Root.GetLasLsya] ранее на службу Бахусу.
Попытаться выяснить, готов[Root.GetEndA] ли §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! познать оккультные силы. В случае успеха, пригласить [Root.GetHersHis] служить Бахусу.

Под покровом цивилизованности лежат бурные страсти, терзающие всех людей. Возрождив культ Бахуса мы позволим самым просветлённым из нас удовлетворить самые сокровенные желания без каких бы то ни было ограничений.

Просто невероятно, но безумные последователи Бахуса, которых считали историей давно минувших дней, спустя века снова возродились, сея повсюду свои опасные извращённые идеи.\nЭти извращенцы, рабы низменных желаний, скрывают свою приверженность силам хаоса, мирно разгуливая среди нас и притворяясь нормальными. Но когда приходит ночь, они собираются в лесу, чтобы танцевать вокруг костра в шкурах козлов и леопардов, совершать непристойные ритуалы совокупления и поедать сырую человеческую плоть.
Так ли уж это плохо - следовать природным инстинктам?

Сегодня вечером [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] присоедини[satanists_recruiter.GetLasLsya] ко мне за ужином, и долж[Root.GetNaEn] признать, [satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe] очаровал[satanists_recruiter.GetEndA] меня. Со временем наш разговор затронул тему первичных потребностей каждо[Root.GetYGo] [Root.GetAgedPersonGEN], которые не принято обсуждать.

— А если я скажу тебе, что могу освободить тебя от оков общественной морали? — бесцеремонно заявил[satanists_recruiter.GetEndA] [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName], и осторожно оглянувшись вокруг, легонько отогнул[satanists_recruiter.GetEndA] рукав, чтобы показать свой шрам в виде пентаграммы, а затем продолжил[satanists_recruiter.GetEndA]. —  Я могу показать тебе мир в его истинном обличии, полный страсти и наслаждений, свободный от лжи и лицемерия...

Под покровом ночи я и [From.GetFirstName] встретились, чтобы направиться прямиком в священную рощу. Под ритмичный завораживающий бой барабанов, напитавшись божьим напитком, мы присоединились к танцу у костра.

Дикая страсть овладела нами, божий напиток струился по нашим венам, наполняя силой и освобождая первичные желания. Мы стали выть, кричать и скакать вокруг плачущих жертв, собранных возле огня. С диким криком я броси[Root.GetLasLsya] на молодого мужчину, вознив зубы в его плоть, разрывая его на части и оскверняя его тело.

Дикая страсть овладела нами, божий напиток струился по нашим венам, наполняя силой и освобождая первичные желания. Мы стали выть, кричать и скакать вокруг плачущих жертв, собранных возле огня. С диким криком я броси[Root.GetLasLsya] на как[FromFrom.GetUyuOgo]-то [FromFrom.GetAgedPersonACC], вознив зубы в [FromFrom.GetHersHis] плоть и разрывая [FromFrom.GetHersHis] на части. Оказалось, это был[FromFrom.GetEndA] [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. Я слишком поздно это понял...
Веселитесь, друзья мои! Цивилизация подождет до завтра.

Наш неистовый танец быстро перерастает в жестокую оргию. Вопли людей и зверей сливаются в зловещей какофонии, пока гротескные тени наших конечностей дрожат, пытаясь ухватиться за пламя костра. Когда я приш[Root.GetLaYol] в себя на следующее утро, измождённ[Root.GetAyaYy] и грязн[Root.GetAyaYy], я не мог[Root.GetNoneE] вспомнить ничего, кроме обрывков ужасных видений о наслаждениях, пережитых во время этой вакханалии.

Наш неистовый танец быстро перерастает в жестокую оргию. Вопли людей и зверей сливаются в зловещей какофонии, пока гротескные тени наших конечностей дрожат, пытаясь ухватиться за пламя костра. На самом пике наслаждения, когда я почувствовал[Root.GetEndA], как боги наполняют моё тело, я вдруг увидел[Root.GetEndA], как кто-то орёт на меня и бьёт по голове.

Когда [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] присоедини[satanists_recruit.GetLasLsya] ко мне за ужином, я постара[Root.GetLasLsya] осторожно завести разговор к теме отвратительных практик в наших ритуалах. К счастью, мои тщательно подобранные слова произвели нужный эффект. В [satanists_recruit.GetHersHis] глазах я увидел[Root.GetEndA] неподдельный интерес к нашей дискуссии, за которым явно скрывались тайные желания.

Когда [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] присоедини[satanists_recruit.GetLasLsya] ко мне за ужином, я постара[Root.GetLasLsya] осторожно завести разговор к теме отвратительных практик в нашей общине. К сожалению, мои слова вызвали у н[satanists_recruit.GetHersHis] лишь негативную реакцию. Всем своим видом [satanists_recruit.GetSheHe] дал[satanists_recruit.GetEndA] мне понять, что не собирается обсуждать подобное со мной.
Избрать §Yнаправление язычества§!, к которому Вы хотите принадлежать.
Отказаться от §Yнаправление язычества§!, к которому Вы принадлежите, чтобы выбрать новое.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of its organized, proselytizing neighbors. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and the most powerful of [Root.GetHerHis] priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to turn the tides and protect their ancient customs.\nWith official clergy and ratified scriptures, this new religion has already started to spread amongst the old [Root.Religion.GetName] faithful.
My lover [From.GetFirstName] has just informed me that she is pregnant with my child.
I have received news that my lover [From.GetFirstName] is with child. Hopefully she will be able to persuade her husband to be the real father.
Now that I have embraced the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, I must choose which branch of it I ascribe to...
Правители следуют принципам синкретизма и меритократии
Правители следуют принципам человеческих жертвоприношений и мореплавания
Запрещает близкородственные браки, но разрешает выбор наследника
Разрешает полигамию и священный брак между близкими родственниками
Поощряет религиозные налоги и монашеские традиции
Убирает штраф за короткое правление и даёт устойчивость к проповедям со стороны других религий
Правители могут плавать по рекам и не страдают от штрафов за короткое правление
Разрешает выбор наследника и даёт устойчивость к проповедям со стороны других религий
Разрешает полигамию и избавляет войска от "оборонительного" измора на территории врага
Правители следуют скандинавским принципам мореплавания и поиска приключений
Избавляет войска от "оборонительного" измора на территории врага
Снижает затраты на корабли в 10 раз
Rulers can sacrifice infidel prisoners to gain Piety
Запрещает мужчинам участвовать в общественной жизни и государственных делах
Мужчины и женщины имеют равные права и статус в политике
Запрещает женщинам участвовать в общественной жизни и государственных делах
Знаки зодиака учитываются при рождении и являются чертами характера
Боевой дух войск зависит от результата прорицания со стороны священнослужителей
Разрешает проявлять симпатию к другим религиозным группам
Разрешает священный брак между близкими родственниками
Эт[_от] [__персонаж] был[_] рожден[_] от наложника правительницы. Дети наложников могут наследовать, но к ним плохо относится общество.
Это подлая стерва [From.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] заставил[From.GetEndA] меня стать [From.GetHersHis] наложни[Root.GetTseyKom]!

М[target_consort.GetOyaOy] наложни[target_consort.GetTsaK] [target_consort.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], меня явно недолюбливает. Любовь, конечно, в этом деле - лишнее, но хотелось бы увидеть хоть немного радости на [target_consort.GetHersHis] лице.

М[From.GetOyaOy] наложни[From.GetTsaK] [From.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] сбежал[From.GetEndA] сегодня ночью! [From.GetSheHeCap] выбра[From.GetLasLsya] через окно своей комнаты в одной из башен. Скорее всего [From.GetHerHim] кто-то помог - страже никак не удавалось разыскать [From.GetHersHis] до тех пор, пока [From.GetSheHe] не оказа[From.GetLasLsya] за пределами страны.
Я уверена, что беременна... мой наложник будет доволен.
Я уверена, что беременна. Интересно, кто же из моих наложниов - счастливый отец?

Эллинистическая школа стоицизма основана на уходе от излишеств и страстей в пользу уравновешенного рационального подхода к жизни, сосредоточенного вокруг добродетелей мудрости, отваги, умеренности и справедливости. Большинство стоиков считают, что счастья можно достичь, изучая философию и ведя добродетельную жизнь.

x: x #Апатия (вин падеж не совпадает), Бесстрастие, Невозмутимость

ENGLISH: Провозгласить серию социальных эдиктов, которые постепенно приведут местное население к более цивилизованной [From.GetCultureAdj]ой культуре.
Позволяет, кликнув §Gправой кнопкой мыши§! по гербовому щиту округа, обратить местное население в Вашу культуру.

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
Беспокойная жизнь правителя редко даёт возвожность для созерцания. Я прошу тебя найти время для собственного уединения. Подумай о жизни и своих поступках, это поможет тебе придти к лучшему пониманию этого мира.
[Root.GetMOFarewell],
 [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Школа стоицизма была одной из преобладающих ветвей эллинской философии во времена древней Римской империи. Основами учения являются добродетель и умеренность.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] решил[From.GetEndA] восстановить античную школу стоицизма. Учение основано на поисках рациональности и умеренности. Стоики верят, что отказ от излишеств и страстей уравновешивает жизнь и позволяет достигнуть главных добродетелей: мудрости, отваги, умеренности и справедливости.\nВ обществе могут состоять люди разного вероисповедания, однако эта философия всегда была близка к эллинизму.

Сегодня гонец принёс мне сообщение: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] провел[FromFrom.GetEndA] некоторые социальные реформы в [From.GetAdjective]ских землях, чтобы привести местное население к [FromFrom.GetCultureAdj]им обычаям.
Этот священный головной убор, украшенный перьями, настраивает того, кто его носит на мир духов.
Эту корону носит представитель [GetSPRHighGodGEN] на Земле.
Эту корону носит представитель [GetBPRHighGodGEN] на Земле.
Этот священней головной убор, украшенный перьями, носит божественный император [ацтек]ов.
Эта регалия представляет собой воплощение авторитета и просвящённости духовного лидера [_бонпо__]
Эта регалия представляет собой величие и силу божественного императора эллинов.
Вы можете посвятить храм конкретному богу [From.GetRelAdj]ского пантеона, дабы надеяться на его благословение.
Убедитесь, что §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! недавно НЕ посвящал храм какому-нибудь богу.
Решите, какому [From.GetRelAdj]скому богу этот храм будет посвящён.

Many gods inhabit the [Root.Religion.GetName] pantheon, but it would be only right to dedicate such an important temple as [scoped_temple_barony.GetName] to one of the twelve Olympians, the most prestigious of the deities watching us from above.
This temple belongs to one of the Kronid brothers.
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the three sons of [GetKronosSaturnName]: §Y[GetZeusJupiterName]§!, §Y[GetPoseidonNeptuneName]§!, or §Y[GetHadesPlutoName]§!.
Let the gods of war consecrate this temple!
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the more bellicose deities of the pantheon: §Y[GetAthenaMinervaName]§!, §Y[GetAresMarsName]§!, or §Y[GetHephaestusVulcanName]§!.
This is the home of a kind deity.

Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the gods of prosperity: §Y[GetHestiaVestaName]§!, §Y[GetDemetraCeresName]§!, §Y[GetAphroditeVenusName]§!, or §Y[GetHermesMercuryName]§!.
One of the Heavenly Twins will inhabit this temple.
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of sons of Leto: §YApollo§! or §Y[GetArtemisDianaName]§!.

[GetZeusJupiterName] is by many considered the King of Heaven. He and his brothers fought a war against their father for control of all Creation and then gambled over its spoils. Fate bestowed dominion of the skies upon [GetZeusJupiterName], leaving the seas to [GetPoseidonNeptuneName] and the earth to [GetHadesPlutoName].

[GetAresMarsName] has always been a very popular god amongst the Romans, observing a more direct and passionate approach to war compared to his sister [GetAthenaMinervaName]. While not explicitly a god of war, [GetHephaestusVulcanName] is often associated with blacksmiths, siege engines and weapons.

Several Hellenic gods are associated with earth and prosperity. [GetDemetraCeresName] oversees the harvest, [GetAphroditeVenusName] is associated with fertility, [GetHermesMercuryName] to roads and trading, and [GetHestiaVestaName], one of the most beloved Roman goddesses, to hearth and family.

Apollo takes a very prestigious spot in Hellenic mythology, being associated with reason, arts and medicine. His twin sister [GetArtemisDianaName] on the other hand tends to have humbler, more secretive followers, being associated with night and nature.
[GetJizyaNameCap] больше НЕ будет использоваться этой религией
Население других религиозных групп обязано платить [GetJizyaNameACC]
Джизья - подушный ежегодный налог, взимаемый в [muslim.GetGroupName]ских государствах с взрослых и свободных немусульман мужского пола. Он больше, чем религиозный налог Закят, взимаемый с мусульман.
Подушный ежегодный налог, который обязаны платить все, кто не исповедует официальную религию государства. Он больше чем обычный налог, взимаемый с единоверцев.
Священная имперская корона, представляющая собой абсолютную власть над государством, известным как [e_byzantium.GetFullName].

Реформация [Player.GetReligionNameGEN] превратит его в организованную религию. Если Вы не контролируете все священные места, то потребуется §Y50§! морального авторитета и контроль §Y3§! [Player.GetRelAdj]ских священных мест. Это действие обойдётся Вам в §R750§! очков благочестия и позволит определить сущность, доктрину и принципы руководства новой веры, полностью перестроив её догмы.

Мой гость, [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName], больше не в состоянии продолжать свой визит из-за тяжёлой болезни и вынужден[converting_king.GetEndA] вернуться домой до окончания официального визита.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] - невыносим[From.GetAyaYy] слабовольн[From.GetAyaYy] [From.GetAgedPerson], котор[From.GetAyaYy] не доби[From.GetLasLsya] ничего значимого, чтобы прославить своё имя. Мой долг - рассказать всем насколько жалк[From.GetOyIm] [From.GetSheHe] выглядит в глазах других.

§YFull Cognatic Law§! and §YFull Status of Women§! are enforced throughout the realm.

My dissertation on military matters was very appreciated it seems: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for sharing my knowledge with [From.GetHerHim], remarking that [From.GetSheHe] will treasure what [From.GetSheHe] has learned from me.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s response to my military dissertation was cold and disinterested. Whether [From.GetSheHe] is does not care about military matters, or [From.GetSheHe] doubts the validity of my suggestions, it is clear that [From.GetSheHe] was not impressed by my words.

Есть нечто в язычестве, что притягивает меня.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] утверждал[Root.GetEndA], что [Root.GetHersHis] династия происходит от Фалариса, древнего тирана Акраганта, печально известного использованием медного быка против своих врагов.
Можно использовать §Yмедного быка§! для казни узников.

После недавнего напоминания об ужасной судьбе, которая ожидает врагов эт[GetOyOgo] [GetAgedPersonGEN], многие [PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]ские придворные решили не строить против н[GetHersHis] козни. По крайней мере, пока...

Since [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s gruesome execution, the most baffling rumor has been spreading throughout my realm. People around [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have come to believe that the traits I share with the old tyrant of Akragas are no mere coincidence, but rather the proof that I must be a descendant of the infamous Phalaris.\n\nIf I allow such rumors to keep spreading, my entire dynasty's reputation might be stained forever.
If the people cannot love me, they will learn to fear me.
I must stop this madness before it gets out of hand.
I was shocked to hear what fate [From.GetTitledFirstName] has in store for me. This deranged lunatic plans to lock me inside a brazen bull and cook me alive!

As I hear the delightful melody coming from my brazen bull as the screams of [From.GetTitledFirstName] are filtered through the contraption, I find myself reflecting upon how much I have come to rely on this wonderful instrument, and on how much I resemble the enlightened King of Sicily who employed it the first time...

After spending some time researching as well as discussing with a local blacksmith, I was able to submit [From.GetFirstName] to the most intriguing of tortures – a brazen bull. As the [From.GetManWoman] was cooked inside this wonderful contraption, [From.GetHerHis] screams were turned into a delightful and cautionary melody for all my court to hear...
I was shocked to hear what fate [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has in store for me. This deranged lunatic plans to lock me inside a brazen bull and cook me alive!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is pushed screaming and kicking inside the brazen bull in the middle of the throne room, under the silent watch of all my courtiers. The [From.GetManWoman]'s desperate shrieking as [From.GetSheHe] is roasted alive inside the contraption soon turns into harmonious bellowing.

The guards drag me out of the dungeon and to [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s court. My hopes for freedom vanish quickly as I see the imposing figure of the brass bull staring at me from the middle of the hall, surrounded by fearful courtiers. The guards drag me towards the statue while the executioner starts stoking the fires beneath it.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] будет заперт[Root.GetEndA] внутри медного быка и зажарен[Root.GetEndA] живьём.
Ваши §Yвассалы§! будут напуганы (§G+10§! к §Yмнению§!) этим действием.
Let's try something more original this time...
Ugh, just throw them in the Brazen Bull...

Foul rumors are spreading from Sicily. The once prosperous Mediterranean isle has been fallen into the hands of a cruel [From.GetManWoman], who claims to be a descendant of the [pagan_group.GetName] Tyrants of old. 

Consumed by paranoid delusions and sadistic fantasies, [From.GetSheHe] has killed hundreds of [From.GetHerHis] own subjects for the most trivial of slights. 
Most of [From.GetHerHis] victims have met their end in the fiery belly of [From.GetHerHis] brazen bull, symbol of [From.GetHerHis] degenerate dynasty.

My recent victory over the Roman armies of [defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName] has resonated across [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Despite all odds, I was able to lead my people against all the legions and the formidable power of the Imperial fleet, laying waste upon the decadent rule of House [defeated_emperor.GetOnlyDynastyName]. \nSuch was my triumph that the people have started to compare me to Teuta, an ancient [pagan_group.GetName] Queen who once stood against the ambitions of Rome, going even as far as to whisper that my prowess in this war is proof that I share some of my blood with her.

My recent victory over the Roman armies of [defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName] has resonated across [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Despite all odds, I was able to stand strong against all the legions and the formidable power of the Imperial fleet, laying waste upon the decadent rule of House [defeated_emperor.GetOnlyDynastyName]. \nSuch was my triumph that the people have started to compare me to Teuta, an ancient Queen who once stood against the ambitions of Rome, going even as far as to whisper that my prowess in this war is proof that I share some of my blood with her.
And why not? We have so much in common...
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] утверждал[Root.GetEndA], что [Root.GetHersHis] династия происходит от Тевты, царицы пиратов Иллирии, которая противостояла Римской империи в прошлом.
Nonsense! I have nothing in common with her.

As if the humiliation for our recent defeat at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] was not a price steep enough to pay for the Empire, more barbarians are gathering around the banner of our enemy, emboldened by the recent success of their brethren. Their leader has started to spread ludicrous rumors about her ancestral ties to Queen Teuta, another rebellious Queen of Illyria of bygone times. \nWe must clean the stain of this failure from our reputation before it is too late...

The [defeated_emperor.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has recently suffered an ignominious defeat at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Galvanized by their victory, the people of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have started idolizing their [From.GetTitle], comparing [From.GetHerHim] to a ruler of their legends and claiming [From.GetHerHim] to have such a heroic ascendancy.\n Through her victory, the pagan tribes of old Illyria have discovered a new strength to stand against their Roman masters.
Enjoy your fleeting victory while you can!

Dozens of ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... They have not forgotten how I protected them from the Empire in the past, and have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

Dozens of ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... They have not forgotten how [pirate_bloodline_target.GetTitledFirstName] protected their forefathers from the Empire, and have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

A few dozen ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... It seems my name still holds some sway with the people. They have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

It seems that the name of [pirate_bloodline_target.GetTitledFirstName] still holds some sway with the people. They have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

A few pirate ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Their owners have offered their services in the war to come, hoping to repay me for offering them haven from the tyranny of the Imperial fleet of the Romans.

A few pirate ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Their owners have offered their services in the war to come, hoping to repay my family for offering them haven from the tyranny of the Imperial fleet of the Romans.

A promising member of [invited_lodge_soldier.Society.GetName], [invited_lodge_soldier.GetFirstName], is eager to test [invited_lodge_soldier.GetHerHis] mettle in battle and prove [invited_lodge_soldier.GetHerHis] loyalty fighting by my side and leading my armies against the enemies of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

My brothers and sisters of [Root.Society.GetName] will gladly come to the help of a fellow [finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName] warrior in the time of need, rushing out of their sacred forests to prove their mettle and fight against the enemies of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
I need strong fighters to vanquish my foes!
I need staunch spear-men to defend my homeland!
I need swift riders to pursue my enemies!

With the galvanizing presence of [Root.Society.GetName] to lead my troops, scores of new recruits are riding to [Root.Capital.GetName], abandoning their lives as shepherds to become warriors and earn immortal glory by fighting for me.

The fervor of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] runs still through the veins of the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. When called to action, they rush to their family weapons and ride to my banner, ready to show once more the strength and ruthlessness of their ancestors to all those who oppose us.
